content:
Dear students,

Hope you are doing well !!!

(EVEN).

Changa-Gujarat 388421

subject: Reg.Attendance
snippet: Dear Students, This is a gentle reminder to regularly attend all scheduled classes, as maintaining the minimum required attendance (as per university norms) is essential for eligibility in internal
content:
Dear Students,

This is a gentle reminder to regularly attend all scheduled classes,
as *maintaining
the minimum required attendance (as per university norms)* is essential for
eligibility in internal assessments and final examinations.

Please note:

   -

   *Minimum attendance requirement*: 75%
   -

   *Defaulters may face academic consequences*, including disqualification
   from exams or withholding of internal marks.

Make sure to:

   -

   Attend lectures/labs as per the timetable.
   -

   Avoid unnecessary absences.


Regards,
Ankita Amaravat
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Science & Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
CHARUSAT,  Changa

--

subject: Thank You for Your Willingness to Contribute!
snippet: Dear Students, Thank you so much for your willingness to support our research project. We truly appreciate your help in improving the accuracy and effectiveness of our academic email classification
content:
Dear Students,

Thank you so much for your willingness to support our research project. We
truly appreciate your help in improving the accuracy and effectiveness of
our academic email classification model.

As promised, your data will be used *strictly for academic purposes*, and *only
informational emails* will be processed. Your contribution will also be
acknowledged in our final presentation/report.

To make the process simple, we‚Äôve prepared a Google Drive folder containing:

   -

   A script that will extract only academic emails from your inbox

üìÇ Folder link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PbOQD_oKgAsZ9pWPrY62nWme5xyJr6JD?usp=sharing


üì§ Once the extraction is done, please upload your output here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NNd3t-VRDvEbDpGLDJOCsyBMA1t19Pdz?usp=sharing
------------------------------

‚ö†Ô∏è *Important:*
To make the process smoother and more efficient, we‚Äôll be conducting the *email
extraction together over a single Google Meet session*. This will help save
time and allow us to *assist you in real time* with any issues or doubts
you may have during the process.


link meeting:

www.meet.google.com/qqm-yenq-mbe

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out ‚Äî we‚Äôre more than happy
to help!

Once again, thank you for contributing to this student-led research
project. Your support means a lot to us!

Warm regards,
*Vansh Malani ‚Äì 23DCS056*
*James Dhandhukiya ‚Äì 23DCS023*
*Jugvi Desai ‚Äì 23DCS021*

Dear students

Thank you so much for your willingness to support our research project. We
truly appreciate your help in improving the accuracy and effectiveness of
our academic email classification model.

As promised, your data will be used strictly for academic purposes, and
only informational emails will be processed. Your contribution will also be
acknowledged in our final presentation/report.

To make the process simple, we‚Äôve prepared a Google Drive folder containing:

A script that will extract only academic emails from your inbox.

A short instruction video explaining exactly how to run the script safely
and securely.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PbOQD_oKgAsZ9pWPrY62nWme5xyJr6JD?usp=sharing

The video is inside the same folder, titled ‚ÄúEmail Extraction
Instructions.mp4‚Äù.


The link to provide the extracted emails is given below

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NNd3t-VRDvEbDpGLDJOCsyBMA1t19Pdz?usp=sharing
Please go through the video before running the script. If you have any
doubts or face any issues at any step, feel free to reach out to us ‚Äî we're
more than happy to help!

Once again, thank you for contributing to this student-led research
project. Your support means a lot to us!

Warm regards,
Vansh Malani ‚Äì 23DCS056
James Dhandhukiya ‚Äì 23DCS023
Jugvi Desai ‚Äì 23DCS021

As an EC-Council Cyber Mentor, you‚Äôve made a significant impact on the
next-generation of cybersecurity professionals. Make this impact more
uplifting and far-reaching with the *Hackerverse*, an immersive and
gamified platform where your network of students and community members can
boost their cybersecurity skills in *FREE, year-long Capture the Flag
competitions.*

Invite them to participate to gain hands-on experience, compete for
exciting prizes, and earn industry recognition. Together, *let‚Äôs take their
cybersecurity journey to the next level!*
*About the Hackerverse CTF*
The Hackerverse CTF is a high-stakes, adrenaline-pumping Capture the Flag
(CTF) competition held every month, offering exciting cash and in-kind
prizes. The dynamic scoring system rewards speed and precision, making it
an exciting challenge for all participants.
*Why Share the Hackerverse CTF*
The Hackerverse CTF isn't just a competition‚Äîit's a pathway to
skill-building, recognition, and career growth.
Participants will:
‚Ä¢ Develop industry-relevant skills that employers seek
‚Ä¢ Win awards
‚Ä¢ Earn certificates of participation
‚ÄîAll for FREE!

subject: Fwd: Important Lecture/Meeting for MSUD102 Failed Students
snippet: Dear All, For all the concerned students. regards, ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Bina Patel <binapatel.maths@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Jun 24, 2025 at 12:50 PM Subject:
content:
Dear All,

For all the concerned students.

regards,

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Bina Patel <binapatel.maths@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Jun 24, 2025 at 12:50‚ÄØPM
Subject: Important Lecture/Meeting for MSUD102 Failed Students
To: <24depstarstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: HOD Depstar <hodds@charusat.ac.in>, Head CSE <hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>,
Head CE CHARUSAT <hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head IT CHARUSAT <
hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Head Civil CHARUSAT <hod.cv@charusat.ac.in>, Head
Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, HOD AIML <
hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in>, Head EC <headec@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical
CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>,
Head Maths <head.maths@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

This is to inform you that an important *lecture/meeting* has been
scheduled for *all Semester 2 students* who have failed in *MSUD102*
(Engineering
Mathematics-II) during the *regular examination*.

The session will be held on *26/06*, from *9:10 AM to 10:10 AM*, in
the *Seminar
Hall (Third Floor), CSPIT*.

*The schedule for remedial classes will be shared with you shortly.*

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

subject: Re: Announcement: New IEEE CHARUSAT SB Positions are now open for 2025-26
snippet: A gentle reminder to those who are interested to fill in for positions in the student branch. Please note that 30th june is the last date, so complete the procedure as soon as possible. On Mon, 16 Jun
content:
A gentle reminder to those who are interested to fill in for positions in
the student branch. Please note that 30th june is the last date, so
complete the procedure as soon as possible.

On Mon, 16 Jun 2025 at 12:56, IEEE CHARUSAT SB <
ieee.charusatsb@charusat.edu.in> wrote:

> üì¢ IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Call for Executive Committee Members ‚Äì
> 2025-26
>
> Dear *CHARUSAT Students*,
>
> We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that applications for the *IEEE CHARUSAT
> Student Branch Executive Committee* and its chapter positions are now
> *open* for the academic year *2025-26*!
>
> This is your chance to be part of an empowering platform that nurtures *technical
> expertise*, *professional growth*, and *global networking*.
> ------------------------------
> üîé What is IEEE?
>
> IEEE is the world‚Äôs largest technical professional organization dedicated
> to advancing technology. Student branches offer a space for innovation,
> collaboration, and leadership across engineering domains.
> üí° Why Join the IEEE Student Branch?
>
>    - *Enhance Your Resume:* Engage in projects, workshops, and events in
>    domains like AI, Robotics, VLSI, Signal Processing, and more.
>    - *Global Networking:* Connect with professionals, mentors, and
>    students around the world.
>    - *Leadership Roles:* Lead initiatives and build real-world leadership
>    and teamwork skills.
>    - *Exclusive Opportunities:* Participate in events like IEEE Xtreme
>    and international conferences.
>    - *Access Resources:* Utilize tools like the IEEE Xplore Digital
>    Library to stay ahead in your field.
>
> üîó Student Membership Benefits
> <https://www.ieee.org/membership/students/index.html>
> üîó General IEEE Membership Benefits
> <https://www.ieee.org/membership/index.html>
> üß© Available Branches
>
>    1. Main Executive Committee
>    2. Computer Science (CS) Society
>    3. Women In Engineering (WiE) Affinity Group
>    4. Antenna and Propagation Society (APS)
>
> üìå Positions Available
>
>    - Chairperson
>    - Vice-Chairperson
>    - Secretary
>    - Treasurer
>    - Web Master
>
> Each position involves managing academic and extracurricular activities,
> promoting IEEE‚Äôs mission, and encouraging participation within the student
> community.
> üìù How to Apply
>
> Please fill out the Google Form below and note that the last date is *30th
> June, 2025*. The selection process includes evaluation of your responses
> and an interview later on.
>
> üìã Apply Now
> <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdRjH7KzS5k-HnAYka2T6sf1-Z1Jy9r5lmYifWWcA86FMKLtg/viewform?usp=sharing&ouid=102851502240872653276>
>
> We look forward to welcoming passionate student leaders into our IEEE
> community!
>
>

From: Dr. Kirti Makwana <kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in>

Subject: Re: Commencement of Semester III ‚Äì Reporting and Attendance
Reminder
To: <24dcse@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Head CSE DEPSTAR <hod.csds@charusat.ac.in>, Ankita Amaravat <
ankitaamaravat.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Naina Parmar <
nainaparmar.dcs@charusat.ac.in>, Hardik Parmar <
hardikparmar.dcs@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

It is highly disappointing to note that despite prior communication and
repeated reminders, *only a limited number of students *have reported on
the first official day of the Third Semester, i.e., *23rd June 2025*.

Let us be absolutely clear‚Äî*regular classes and laboratory sessions have
commenced as per the academic calendar*, and your absence is viewed as a
serious breach of academic responsibility. This lack of seriousness and
disregard for institutional guidelines will not be tolerated.

All students who have not reported are hereby instructed to join *without
further delay*. Continued absenteeism will result in:

   -

   *Marking of attendance as ‚ÄòAbsent‚Äô from Day 1 onwards | **Strict
   disciplinary action as per the institute norms*

We expect every student to uphold the discipline, commitment, and integrity
expected from a professional academic environment. No further excuses will
be entertained.

*Report to the institute immediately.*

regards,

subject: DEPSTAR_B.Tech CSE_ Sem - 2_May 2025 Examination _List of Toppers
snippet: Dear Students, I am delighted to extend my heartfelt congratulations to each one of you for your exceptional performance in the recent Semester-2 B.Tech CSE University examinations. Your hard work,
content:
*Dear Students,*

I am delighted to extend my heartfelt congratulations to each one of you
for your exceptional performance in the recent Semester-2 B.Tech CSE
University examinations.

Your hard work, dedication, and perseverance have truly paid off, and it
brings immense pride to see such commendable results. Please find attached
the *list of top performers* in the examination.

As you progress in your academic journey, remember that* learning is a
lifelong pursuit*. Continue to embrace challenges, stay curious, and remain
committed to excellence. I have no doubt that you will make meaningful
contributions to the field of *Computer Science and Engineering* in the
years to come.

Wishing you continued success in all your *future endeavors*.



*With regards,*
*Ankita Amaravat*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)*- Changa,

subject: Reg. Activity Planning for Career Readiness (A.Y. 2025-26 (ODD))
snippet: Dear students, As part of our ongoing efforts to support students in preparing for professional opportunities, the Training and Placement Committee, DEPSTAR, has planned various Career Readiness
content:
Dear students,

As part of our ongoing efforts to support students in preparing for
professional opportunities, the *Training and Placement Committee, DEPSTAR,
*has planned various *Career Readiness Activities* aimed at enhancing
essential employability skills.

This series of sessions will cover essential career readiness components,
including *resume writing*, *email etiquette*, *verbal communication skills*,
and *professional branding through platforms like LinkedIn and GitHub*.
Activities such as *icebreaker sessions, role plays*, and *alumni-led
profile reviews* are designed to help students build a confident and
industry-ready professional identity.

Your active participation is highly encouraged, as these sessions will
significantly enhance your preparation for campus placements and contribute
to your overall career growth.

The schedule of the activities is attached herewith for your kind perusal.
-----------------
Regards,
Khushi Patel,
Assistant Professor & Training and Placement Representative,
Department of Computer Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research(DEPSTAR),
Faculty of Technology and Engineering (FTE),
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT), AT: Changa,
Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat.

--

subject: MNC Industrial Internship 2025 || CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY || Talent acquisition ‚Äì Apply Now
snippet: Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY Congratulations on being Shortlisted for the Internship! Registration Closes Soon for 2025 MNC Industrial Internship We hope this message finds you well and focused
content:
*Dear Student of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY *



*Congratulations on being Shortlisted for the Internship!**Registration
Closes Soon for 2025 MNC Industrial Internship *

We hope this message finds you well and focused on your personal and
academic goals.

*You‚Äôre invited to be part of the Career LaunchPad Program by LaunchEd
Global ‚Äî a two-month guided experience that blends structured learning with
real-world application. This program is designed to help students build
skills, deliver actual projects, and prepare for what companies look for in
future professionals.*
------------------------------
*What is the Career LaunchPad?*

A structured program built around the *Learn ‚Üí Apply ‚Üí Launch* model ‚Äî
ideal for students across Tech, Marketing, Design, and Data domains. You'll
work directly with industry professionals and apply your learning to real
projects and business scenarios.
------------------------------
*How to Apply*

   -

   *Pre-register here: *
*[https://forms.gle/charusat.edu.in <https://forms.gle/gW6UW5DWDzQQHRKF8>]
   Selected students will be contacted by our team.*
   -

   *Certifications/Internships Projects & Reports can be submitted to the
   departments for the Academic Credit Points (If it's required).*

------------------------------
*Program Structure*

*Month 1: Skill Foundation & Applied Learning :*

   -

   Learn from scratch ‚Äî covering basics to advanced concepts in your chosen
   domain
   -

   Attend live expert-led sessions across Tech, Marketing, Design, and Data
   -

   Gain exposure to in-demand tools like Generative AI, Low-Code Platforms,
   and Prompt Engineering
   -

   Complete *10 real-world mini projects* to apply your skills in a
   practical setting
   -

   Receive consistent mentor support and hands-on guidance

*Month 2: Business Challenge & Delivery Phase*

   -

   Work on *one real business problem provided by a partner MNC/startup*
   -

   Choose to work *individually or as part of a team*
   -

   Build and present a complete *Minimum Viable Product (MVP)*
   -

   Get structured feedback from professionals as you finalize your project
   -

   Add a tangible, high-impact project to your portfolio

------------------------------
*Post Program Benefits*

   -

   *Real-World Project Experience* ‚Äì Build practical work you can showcase
   -

   *Mentorship from Experienced Professionals* ‚Äì Learn with expert guidance
   -

   *Masterclasses by CXOs & Startup Founders* ‚Äì Gain insights from top
   industry leaders
   -

   *AI-Based Career Assessment Tool* ‚Äì Understand your strengths and career
   path
   -

   *Personalized Resume Reviews & Mock Interviews* ‚Äì Boost interview
   confidence
   -

   *Co-Branded Certificate & Letter of Recommendation* ‚Äì Enhance your
   professional profile
   -

   *Wipro Dice ID Verification* ‚Äì Adds credibility to your credentials
   -

   *Portfolio Building Support* ‚Äì Present your work in a professional format
   -

   *Access to an Alumni & Mentor Network* ‚Äì Stay connected and supported
   long-term
   -

   *No Prior Experience Required* ‚Äì Open to students from all academic
   backgrounds
   -

   *Soft Skill & Communication Development* ‚Äì Improve your ability to pitch
   and present

------------------------------

*We look forward to your active participation in the Training and
Internship Program. This is an excellent chance for you to broaden your
horizons and take a step towards a successful career. For any inquiries or
assistance, feel free to contact us. *

Warm regards,
*LaunchED Global Internship Team*

subject: Fwd: Emerging Research Trends in Engineering (ERTE 2025)
snippet: Dear Friends, IEEE Gujarat Section, along with Kadi Sarva Vishwavidyalaya and IEEE KSV SB, is organizing a 2-day event ‚ÄúEmerging Research Trends in Engineering (ERTE 2025)‚Äù on July 26‚Äì27, 2025. The
content:
Dear Friends,

IEEE Gujarat Section, along with Kadi Sarva Vishwavidyalaya and IEEE KSV
SB, is organizing a 2-day event *‚ÄúEmerging Research Trends in Engineering
(ERTE 2025)‚Äù* on *July 26‚Äì27, 2025*. The theme is *AI for Smart Cities and
Industry 4.0*.

Interested students can find more details in the forwarded mail below.
Regards,
Dhruv Rupapara

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: IEEE eNotice <enotice@enotice.ieee.org>
Date: Tue, Jun 3, 2025 at 5:26‚ÄØPM
Subject: Emerging Research Trends in Engineering (ERTE 2025)
To: <dhruvrupapara@ieee.org>


If you are having trouble reading this message, click here
<https://enotice.mmsend.com/link.cfm?r=XPymsfUffb7PYPRLG7h95Q~~&pe=ND6C_G_4XR7QwsC0DN1gvYOvZ57b8ruOGT492fDy5UinE7tL911ili6B-6NrwdnFxyyA1OBe0eeYBZxh9tjRKA~~&t=CNwiJ1nlky-5HZTdButDjA~~>
for the web version.

Dear all,

It is our pleasure to inform you that IEEE Gujarat Section, along with Kadi
Sarva Vishwavidyalaya, Gandhinagar, IEEE KSV SB is organizing a 2-day event
on "*Emerging Research Trends in Engineering (ERTE 2025)*" during *July
26-27, 2025.  *The event aims to provide an insight into industrial
practices, current research areas, and trends in the field of *"AI for
Smart Cities and Industry 4.0."* The event is supported by IEEE SPS, IEEE
CS, IEEE IES/IAS/PELS, and the IEEE PES chapter of the IEEE Gujarat
Section.

*Following are distinguished speakers of the event*

¬∑        Mr. Samir Bhatt, E-Infochip, Ahmedabad.

¬∑        Mr. Jugal Oza, E-infochip, Ahmedabad

¬∑        Dr. Mahipal Jadeja, MNIT, Jaipur

¬∑        Dr. Sudeep Tanwar, Nirma University, Ahmedabad

¬∑        Mr. Sohil Patel, Oizom Instruments Pvt Ltd, Ahmedabad

¬∑        Mr. Naveen Gupta, Deets Digital, Ahmedabad

¬∑        Mr. Vicrumnaug Vuppalaty, Fiscal Ox Cloud Pvt Ltd, Vadodara.



*Registration link:*  https://forms.gle/xbNDCXLbJk1zx4Y56

      - IEEE Student Member: Rs. 400/-

subject: Invitation to Participate in Online Quiz on 11th International Day of Yoga ‚Äì Organized by NSS-PDPIAS Unit

content:
Dear All,

Warm Greetings!

On the occasion of the *11th International Day of Yoga*, the *NSS Unit of
PDPIAS* is organising an *Online Quiz* to spread awareness about the
ancient Indian practice of Yoga and its significance in our daily lives.

We invite all students, faculties, staff and CHARUSAT family members to
participate in this engaging and informative quiz enthusiastically.

*Date:* 17th June 2025
*Mode:* Online
*Quiz Link:* https://forms.gle/Pvc3gGbRbmEGZC6k6
*Time: *10:00 AM to 03:00 PM

*E-certificates* will be provided to all participants on or before June 19,
2025, via email.

The quiz aims to promote the importance of Yoga for physical and mental
well-being and to honour the spirit of this global celebration.

Let us come together and celebrate *Yoga for harmony and peace*.

For any queries, please contact: Dr. Rajesh V. Savalia, M. 94292 22899

-- 
Thanks & Regards,

subject: Announcement: New IEEE CHARUSAT SB Positions are now open for 2025-26
snippet: üì¢ IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Call for Executive Committee Members ‚Äì 2025-26 Dear CHARUSAT Students, We're thrilled to announce that applications for the IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Executive
content:
IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch 2025-26
üì¢ IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Call for Executive Committee Members ‚Äì
2025-26

Dear *CHARUSAT Students*,

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that applications for the *IEEE CHARUSAT Student
Branch Executive Committee* and its chapter positions are now *open* for
the academic year *2025-26*!

This is your chance to be part of an empowering platform that nurtures
*technical
expertise*, *professional growth*, and *global networking*.
------------------------------
üîé What is IEEE?

IEEE is the world‚Äôs largest technical professional organization dedicated
to advancing technology. Student branches offer a space for innovation,
collaboration, and leadership across engineering domains.
üí° Why Join the IEEE Student Branch?

   - *Enhance Your Resume:* Engage in projects, workshops, and events in
   domains like AI, Robotics, VLSI, Signal Processing, and more.
   - *Global Networking:* Connect with professionals, mentors, and students
   around the world.
   - *Leadership Roles:* Lead initiatives and build real-world leadership
   and teamwork skills.
   - *Exclusive Opportunities:* Participate in events like IEEE Xtreme and
   international conferences.
   - *Access Resources:* Utilize tools like the IEEE Xplore Digital Library
   to stay ahead in your field.

üîó Student Membership Benefits
<https://www.ieee.org/membership/students/index.html>
üîó General IEEE Membership Benefits
<https://www.ieee.org/membership/index.html>
üß© Available Branches

   1. Main Executive Committee
   2. Computer Science (CS) Society
   3. Women In Engineering (WiE) Affinity Group
   4. Antenna and Propagation Society (APS)

üìå Positions Available

   - Chairperson
   - Vice-Chairperson
   - Secretary
   - Treasurer
   - Web Master

Each position involves managing academic and extracurricular activities,
promoting IEEE‚Äôs mission, and encouraging participation within the student
community.
üìù How to Apply

Please fill out the Google Form below and note that the last date is *30th
June, 2025*. The selection process includes evaluation of your responses
and an interview later on.

üìã Apply Now
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdRjH7KzS5k-HnAYka2T6sf1-Z1Jy9r5lmYifWWcA86FMKLtg/viewform?usp=sharing&ouid=102851502240872653276>

We look forward to welcoming passionate student leaders into our IEEE
community!

subject: Fwd: Call for Student Mentees - IEEE IAYPC Career Mentoring Program 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Please explore the opportunity for a better technical career provided by IEEE. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Chengappa Munjandira <chengappa.mr@ieee.org> Date:
content:
Dear Students,

Please explore the opportunity for a better technical career provided by
IEEE.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Chengappa Munjandira <chengappa.mr@ieee.org>
Date: Sun, Jun 15, 2025 at 9:57‚ÄØAM
Subject: Call for Student Mentees - IEEE IAYPC Career Mentoring Program 2025
To:


If you are having trouble reading this message, click here
<https://enotice.mmsend.com/link.cfm?r=XPymsfUffb7PYPRLG7h95Q~~&pe=lDU9uOgEmixhTa4mlx4L_85jSNTo6kEPdkeVZWXuQQOrb0uD8aVexOLfb2q9fLbF80ztjbUPF8nQJWrX8wDieQ~~&t=LjRDIquXJkTX64XoXS9OwQ~~>
for the web version.

Dear IEEE Members,



Greetings from the IEEE India Council Industry-Academia Young Professionals
Committee (IAYPC) 2025.

We are happy to announce the launch of the *Career Mentoring Program (CMP)*
for pre-final and final-year undergraduate students from CSE, IT, ECE, EEE,
and allied engineering branches. If you are eager to plan your career
smartly, gain exposure to industry insights, and grow your professional
network ‚Äî this is the opportunity for you!

*CMP 2025 Program Objective*

The Career Mentoring Program (CMP) is a structured initiative aimed at
providing personalized guidance and mentorship to students by pairing them
with experienced academic and industry professionals. The goal is to help
students make informed career decisions, explore global opportunities, and
build a mind-set for continuous learning and leadership. Through one-on-one
interactions, expert talks, mock interviews, and skill-building workshops,
the program fosters holistic development and industry readiness.

*üåü** Program Highlights*

üí° One-on-One Mentorship with Industry and Academic Experts

üéì Career Planning & Higher Studies Guidance

üì¢ Expert Sessions, Tech Talks, Capsule Courses

üß† Mock Interviews & Upskilling Workshops

üìà Personalized Monthly Reviews and Feedback

üìÉ Certificate from IEEE India Council upon Completion

üèÖ Special Recognition for Outstanding Mentees



*Eligibility Criteria*

Pre-final or final-year B.E./B.Tech. students

Disciplines: CSE, IT, ECE, EEE, or related fields

Willingness to commit 7‚Äì8 hours per month for mentoring activities

üìÖ *Important Dates*

Application Deadline: 20 June 2025

Induction Meeting: 18 July 2025

Program Duration: 21 July ‚Äì 30 November 2025

üí∞ *Registration Fee*

IEEE Members: ‚Çπ500 + GST

Non-IEEE Members: ‚Çπ650 + GST

(Proof of payment will be required during form submission)

üìù *Apply Now*

Seats are limited and applications will be processed on a first-come,
first-served basis.

üîó Fill out the form here: https://ieeeindiacouncil.org/iaypc-2025/
<https://enotice.mmsend.com/link.cfm?r=XPymsfUffb7PYPRLG7h95Q~~&pe=Py1UpWwRTFgjJ-sNwPEyXAdSoHOXJn1DSi4yTCv6e4zJgDg22uJ1xsSsLvONz0gy6UcdLrI4m8EnZWxGOJKjuQ~~&t=LjRDIquXJkTX64XoXS9OwQ~~>



For any queries, feel free to connect with the program coordinators:

*Dr. R. Suganya (VIT) email: suganya.ramamoorthy@vit.ac.in
<suganya.ramamoorthy@vit.ac.in>*

*Dr. Nisha G K (MBCET) email: nisha.gk@mbcet.ac.in <nisha.gk@mbcet.ac.in>*



Join us in this transformative journey to shape your future with clarity,
confidence, and competence. Let your career take a leap with guidance from
the best in the field. We invite you to join us and please share this
information with others who may benefit from it.



Please find the attached flyer and for more updates follow us on LinkedIn
handle: IAYPC 2025 (
https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-india-council-industry-academia-young-professional-committee/
<https://enotice.mmsend.com/link.cfm?r=XPymsfUffb7PYPRLG7h95Q~~&pe=ZF9lgMLdk6My9nd1JVwxseO94rCszSsA2EK2i1EX_phhMTV0pBLLzy4B0AHM1lFLTgE3W1kGgPj2TmNoOrQ01w~~&t=LjRDIquXJkTX64XoXS9OwQ~~>
)

Warm regards,

*TEAM IAYPC 2025*


Dr. Ruchika Gupta, Chandigarh University (Convener)

subject: Fwd: üåø Invitation to Participate in Yogya 2025 ‚Äì University-Level Online Yoga Competition | International Yoga Day Celebration
snippet: Dear Faculty Members and Students, Warm greetings from the CHARUSAT NSS Cell! On the occasion of International Yoga Day 2025, we are delighted to announce ‚ÄúYOGYA 2025: The Virtual Yoga Challenge‚Äù, a
content:
*Dear Faculty Members and Students,*

Warm greetings from the CHARUSAT NSS Cell!

On the occasion of *International Yoga Day 2025*, we are delighted to
announce *‚ÄúYOGYA 2025: The Virtual Yoga Challenge‚Äù*, a university-level
online yoga competition organized by *NSS ARIP* (Ashok & Rita Patel
Institute of Physiotherapy) under the *CHARUSAT NSS Cell*, in collaboration
with the PHYSICAL EDUCATION & SPORTS SECTION.

This event is an opportunity to showcase your passion for yoga, creativity,
and mindfulness while celebrating the spirit of health and harmony.
[image: ‚ú®] Themes for Yogya 2025

   1. Yoga for the Mindful Generation
   2. Breathe In Positivity, Breathe Out Stress
   3. Stretch to Destress
   4. Unity in Diversity ‚Äì Yoga Beyond Borders
   5. Unplug to Connect: Digital Detox through Yoga

[image: üßò] Participation Guidelines

   - Submit a 1‚Äì2 minute video demonstrating 3‚Äì5 yoga asanas.
   - Choose any one theme and express it through your flow.
   - Top 10 participants will be invited to perform live in the final round via
   an online platform. (Zoom or Google Meet)
   - Entries will be judged on technique, flow, creativity, and thematic
   expression.

[image: üìÖ] Key Dates

   - Last Date for Registration & Submission: 16/06/2025
   - Final Round (Live via online platform): 19/06/2025 (Timings will be
   communicated - preferably evening around  6:00 pm)
   - Result Announcement: 20/06/2025

[image: üèÜ] Awards & Recognition

   -

   Best Yoga Performer (Student and Faculty)
   -

   Most Creative Flow (Student and Faculty)
   -

   Best Video Setup (Student and Faculty)

[image: üìú] E-certificates will be awarded to all participants.


[image: üì•] Register & Upload Your Video Here:
https://forms.gle/s7enhcCicAPNZ8N99


For any queries, feel free to contact:

   - Dr. Shreya Swami (PT) ‚Äì +91-6353651313 - shreyaswami.phy@charusat.ac.in
   - Dr. Disha Shah (PT) ‚Äì +91-9974790312 ‚Äì dishashah.phy@charusat.ac.in

We warmly invite all students and faculty members to participate in this
celebration of health, balance, and inner strength. Let‚Äôs bend, breathe,
and belong ‚Äî together !!

*Jay Hind !!*
CHARUSAT NSS Cell !!
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*



-- 
Thanks & Regards,

--

subject: Invitation to participate in 11th International Yoga Day - Online Debate Competition organized by¬†IIIM¬†NSS¬†Cell
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings from IIIM NSS Cell!!! To celebrate the 11th International Yoga Day, Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) - NSS Cell has organized an Online Debate competition on
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings from IIIM NSS Cell!!!

To celebrate the *11th International Yoga Day,* Indukaka Ipcowala Institute
of Management (IIIM) - NSS Cell has organized an *Online Debate competition*
 on *June 20, 2025 (Friday).*



*Online Debate Competition ‚Äì Event Details:*

*Date:* June 20, 2025
*Time:* 10:30 AM Onward
*Theme:* Yoga for One Earth, One Health* (Topics to be provided one hour
prior to the scheduled start of the competition)*

*Registration Process:*
Interested participants are requested to register latest by *June 19,
2025* *till
12 PM* using the following link: https://forms.gle/Qzf1YCSnSnDxqFX68

*Online Debate Format:*
*The structure and flow of the debate will be determined based on the total
number of registered participants. Topics will be shared with participants
one hour prior to the competition.*

*Proposed Rounds:*

   1. *Preliminary Round:*
      - Each participant will speak for 3 minutes, either *for* or
*against* the
      motion.
      - Top-performing speakers from the preliminary round will advance to
      the final round.
   2. *Final Round (Crossfire & Closing Statement):*
      - A crossfire round will be conducted, where the selected
      participants will engage in a Q&A session with each other and the judges.
      - Each finalist will then present a 1-minute closing statement.

*Judging Criteria:*

   - Content & Knowledge
   - Delivery & Clarity
   - Rebuttal & Defence
   - Engagement & Time Adherence

*Certificates:*


   - Winners will be awarded 1st, 2nd, and 3rd prizes.
   - All participants will receive a Certificate of Participation.


Together let's make this International Yoga Day memorable. We look forward
to your cooperation at this extraordinary
International Yoga Day Celebration.



Please contact* IIIM NSS Coordinators: *Dr. Poonam Amrutia (+91 94295
58484); Mr. Brijesh Patel (+91 97370 23027) for further details.


*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

CHARUSAT Startup and Innovation Centre CHARUSAT <edic@charusat.ac.in>



Dear All
You are requested to circulate the below email received from i-Create,
Gujarat, to all interested students , faculty for startup and innovations.


Subject: ProtoQuik Launchpad, Cohort 1: Robotics from iCreate

I am reaching out to you to introduce *ProtoQuik Launchpad, Cohort 1*:
*Robotics*, and seeking your help to identify and attract high-potential
teams and innovators. It would be immensely helpful if you could share the
attached outreach material with your network of students, alumni,
faculty-led startups, or affiliated incubation centers. More details are
available in the attached brochure and webpage:
https://protoquik.icreate.org.in/

This one-of-a-kind programme is designed to help students, innovators and
startups bridge the critical *TRL-4 to TRL-7 gap* ‚Äì often referred to as
the ‚Äú*Valley of Death*‚Äù. Through a *fully sponsored* and intensive
*30-day* journey,
selected participants will gain:
‚úÖ Up to ‚Çπ200K prototyping support
‚úÖ Opportunity to pitch for funding from a ‚Çπ20 Million pool
‚úÖ Expert-led sessions & one-on-one mentoring
‚úÖ Support to refine your prototype into an MVP
‚úÖ Access to mentors, designers, vendors & suppliers
‚úÖ Full access to iCreate's labs & fabrication facilities
‚úÖ Networking with investors, startups, and industry leaders
‚úÖ Pilot deployment opportunities & public showcases

All program benefits are fully sponsored (worth ‚Çπ500K), including lodging
and boarding.

The first cohort is exclusively for *robotics *startups and innovators,
especially those working on solutions in areas such as autonomous mobility,
underwater systems, vertical climbing robots, snake bots for search &
rescue, and more.

*Program Duration: *01 ‚Äì 31 July 2025
*Location*: iCreate Campus
*Applications close on*: 15 June 2025

We believe this programme aligns well with the national vision to
strengthen India‚Äôs Deep Tech and robotics innovation ecosystem. Your
support in spreading the word would go a long way in making this initiative
a success.

Please feel free to reach out if you need any more information or if you'd
like to nominate specific candidates or teams.

Kind regards,
Hiren Yadav



*Hiren Yadav*

*Team Marketing & Outreach*

 *Campus:* Opp. Kensville Golf Club & Resort, Off Bavla Rajkot Highway, Deo
Dholera Village, Ahmedabad 382240

*City Office:* 1st Floor, GMDC Building, 132 Ft Ring Road, Vastrapur,
Ahmedabad 380052
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/132+Ft+Ring+Road,+Vastrapur,+Ahmedabad+380052?entry=gmail&source=g>

--

CHARUSAT Startup and Innovation Centre CHARUSAT <edic@charusat.ac.in>



Dear All
You are requested to circulate the below email received from i-Create,
Gujarat, to all interested students , faculty for startup and innovations.


Subject: ProtoQuik Launchpad, Cohort 1: Robotics from iCreate

I am reaching out to you to introduce *ProtoQuik Launchpad, Cohort 1*:
*Robotics*, and seeking your help to identify and attract high-potential
teams and innovators. It would be immensely helpful if you could share the
attached outreach material with your network of students, alumni,
faculty-led startups, or affiliated incubation centers. More details are
available in the attached brochure and webpage:
https://protoquik.icreate.org.in/

This one-of-a-kind programme is designed to help students, innovators and
startups bridge the critical *TRL-4 to TRL-7 gap* ‚Äì often referred to as
the ‚Äú*Valley of Death*‚Äù. Through a *fully sponsored* and intensive
*30-day* journey,
selected participants will gain:
‚úÖ Up to ‚Çπ200K prototyping support
‚úÖ Opportunity to pitch for funding from a ‚Çπ20 Million pool
‚úÖ Expert-led sessions & one-on-one mentoring
‚úÖ Support to refine your prototype into an MVP
‚úÖ Access to mentors, designers, vendors & suppliers
‚úÖ Full access to iCreate's labs & fabrication facilities
‚úÖ Networking with investors, startups, and industry leaders
‚úÖ Pilot deployment opportunities & public showcases

All program benefits are fully sponsored (worth ‚Çπ500K), including lodging
and boarding.

The first cohort is exclusively for *robotics *startups and innovators,
especially those working on solutions in areas such as autonomous mobility,
underwater systems, vertical climbing robots, snake bots for search &
rescue, and more.

*Program Duration: *01 ‚Äì 31 July 2025
*Location*: iCreate Campus
*Applications close on*: 15 June 2025

We believe this programme aligns well with the national vision to
strengthen India‚Äôs Deep Tech and robotics innovation ecosystem. Your
support in spreading the word would go a long way in making this initiative
a success.

Please feel free to reach out if you need any more information or if you'd
like to nominate specific candidates or teams.

Kind regards,
Hiren Yadav



*Hiren Yadav*

*Team Marketing & Outreach*

 *Campus:* Opp. Kensville Golf Club & Resort, Off Bavla Rajkot Highway, Deo
Dholera Village, Ahmedabad 382240

*City Office:* 1st Floor, GMDC Building, 132 Ft Ring Road, Vastrapur,
Ahmedabad 380052

--

subject: "Internship_Career - B Tech 1st Year Students of Charusat University!"
snippet: Dear Student from Charusat University. Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Internship Program! LaunchEd Global in Collaboration IIT KHARAGPUR(Kshitij) is Organizing a 2-month Training &
content:
*Dear Student** from **Charusat University**.*

*Congratulations* on being shortlisted for the *Internship Program!*

*LaunchEd Global* in Collaboration *IIT KHARAGPUR(Kshitij)* is
Organizing a *2-month
Training & Internship Program with certifications from WIPRO Dice ID, IBM,
CISCO, META, and AICTE-approved.* Gain *industry-leading skills* and
*real-world
experience* to advance your career!

*Fill out the Google Form today to reserve your place in the program:*

                https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9
<https://forms.gle/ux9C9RpVqkDkcmf69>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information:*

     https://chat.whatsapp.com/HQlb0D2oAFl2Dfp4q9e3wR
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/ENKgO96eEfmD3PZz5aeM3V>

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*
*1. Training Outline*

   - *Live Mentoring with Industry Experts:* Evening classes (6:30 PM -
   8:00 PM) are conducted live on the Zoom platform to fit your schedule. Get
   guidance at every step.
- *From Basics to Advanced:* Perfect for beginners and those looking to
   refine advanced skills, starting from scratch.
- *AI-Powered Development Made Easy*: Build applications with minimal
   coding, create innovative solutions using Generative AI, and easily design
   effective AI prompts.
- *LMS Access for Flexibility: *Recorded live sessions will be uploaded to
   the Learning Management System (LMS) and available for 6 months from the
   batch start date. Login credentials will be shared after registration,
   ensuring uninterrupted learning at your own pace.

*2. Internship Conduct*

   - *10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project,
   where students will work on projects related to each topic they are
   learning.
   - *Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and
   you will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
   assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
   data and materials for the project.
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certifications Provided*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from
   IIT-KHARAGPUR(Kshitij)
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a certificate from our partnered MNCs &
   StartUps.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Both the Certificates will be verified by
   WIPRO Dice ID
   - *100% Placement Assistance: *Join Our Growth Community for Direct
   Placement Support with Top Companies.

subject: Join the World Hackathon and Innovate Globally!
snippet: Hi Kevin, Get ready to showcase your skills and innovate on a global scale! The World Hackathon is just around the corner, and we're inviting developers, designers, and innovators like you to
content:
Hi Kevin,

Get ready to showcase your skills and innovate on a global scale! The *World
Hackathon* is just around the corner, and we're inviting developers,
designers, and innovators like you to participate.

This virtual event brings together brilliant minds from around the globe to
collaborate, learn, and build groundbreaking solutions. Whether you're a
seasoned hacker or new to hackathons, the World Hackathon offers an
incredible opportunity to:

   - *Solve real-world problems:* Work on challenging tracks and develop
   solutions that can make a real impact.
   - *Collaborate internationally:* Team up with participants from diverse
   backgrounds and expand your network.
   - *Learn and grow:* Access workshops, mentorship, and resources to
   enhance your skills.
   - *Win exciting prizes:* Compete for recognition and rewards.

------------------------------

*Event Details:*

   - *Website:* https://world-hackathon.devpost.com/
   - *Registration Deadline:* 14-06-2025
   - *Event Dates:* 14-06-2025 TO 20-06-2025

------------------------------

Ready to make your mark? Visit our Devpost page to learn more about the
challenges, rules, and how to register.

We can't wait to see what you'll create!

Best regards,

The World Hackathon Team
[image: imagy-image.jpg]

subject: Embrace Harmony: Yoga & Nature Session
snippet: Dear All, As part of the 11th International Day of Yoga (IDY) 2025 celebrations, CHARUSAT enthusiastically invites you to a week-long series of events promoting health, mindfulness, and environmental
content:
Dear All,

As part of the 11th International Day of Yoga (IDY) 2025 celebrations,
CHARUSAT enthusiastically invites you to a week-long series of events
promoting health, mindfulness, and environmental consciousness.

Join us for our special "Yoga & Nature" Session, designed to connect your
well-being with the serenity of the outdoors.

*Event Details:*

   - *What:* "Yoga & Nature" Session
   - *When:* June 16th to June 20th, 2025
   - *Time:* 5:30 PM to 6:45 PM daily
   - *Where:* Centre Lawn, CHARUSAT Campus

This session offers a unique opportunity to experience the profound
benefits of Yoga amidst nature, aligning with this year's IDY theme: "Yoga
for One Earth, One Health." Let's come together to foster holistic
well-being and environmental sustainability.

*Kindly confirm your registration by clicking on:  *
https://forms.gle/qoQfRvsiWWLv1Kmy7

*Who can attend:* All CHARUSAT students, faculty, staff, and the wider
community are welcome!

Please bring: Your own yoga mat and a water bottle.

E-Certificates will be provided to all participants.

Let's celebrate the spirit of Yoga and its connection to our planet. We
look forward to seeing you there!

*For more information, please contact:*
Dr.Pritesh Patel
-- 
Assistant Director of Physical Education and Sports
CHARUSAT Physical Education and Sports Section
(A constituent of CHARUSAT)
*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC, GOI*
*Accredited with Centre of Excellence by GOG*
Landline No: 02697-265036
Mobile : -- 97142 96999

--

subject: New announcement: "Course pre-requisite topics and‚Ä¶"
snippet: Notification settings CEUE203 - Object Oriented Programming OOP New announcement Course pre-requisite topics and materials: 1. INTRODUCTION 1.1 Overview of OOP principles: Encapsulation, Inheritance,
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s?email%3D24dcs053@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dcs053@charusat.edu.in>
CEUE203 - Object Oriented Programming OOP  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzgxNzYyNzUyMTAy?email%3D24dcs053@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dcs053@charusat.edu.in>
New announcement

Course pre-requisite topics and materials:

1. INTRODUCTION
1.1
Overview of OOP principles: Encapsulation, Inheritance, Polymorphism,
Abstraction.
1.2
Data Types: Integer (byte, short, int, long), Floating-point (float,  
double), Character,
Boolean.
1.3
Variables: Dynamic Intialization, Scope and Lifetime of variable, Type  
Casting, Type
promotion rule
1.4
Operators: Arithmetic, Bitwise, Relational, Boolean, Assignment, ternary  
(threeway).
1.5
Control Statements: if, nested ifs, Traditional Switch, Iteration  
statements (while, dowhile,
for, For-Each, Nested Loops), Jump statements (break, continue, return)
Materials: -
‚û¢ https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/operators-in-java/

2. BASICS OF ARRAY
2.1 Introduction to Arrays, Types of Array
2.2 Array Operations: Traversing arrays with for, for-each, and enhanced  
for loop
2.3
Copying arrays, cloning arrays, Searching and sorting elements in an array,  
Jagged
Arrays, Memory Representation of Arrays
Materials: -
‚û¢ https://www.programiz.com/java-programming/arrays
‚û¢ https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/jagged-array-in-java/
‚û¢  
https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/where-is-the-memory-allocated-for-arrays-in-java/


3. FUNDAMENTAL OF INHERITANCE
3.1
Concept and need for inheritance in OOP, Types of Inheritance: Single  
Inheritance,
Multilevel Inheritance, Hierarchical Inheritance
Materials: -
‚û¢ https://www.scaler.com/topics/java/inheritance-in-java/
FUNDAMENTAL OF POLYMORPHISM
3.2
Concept and need for polymorphism in OOP, Types of polymorphism, Method
Overloading, Method Overriding
Materials: -
‚û¢ https://www.scaler.com/topics/java/polymorphism-in-java/

4. STL - 7th chapter of Programming with C++ subject

5. Basics of Java: What is JDK?, Installation of JDK, Hello world print,  
scan and print in Java, variables in java, basic syntax, difference between  
C++ and Java.
https://www.w3schools.com/java/
https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/java/
See details  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzgxNzYyNzUyMTAy/p/NzgxNzYzMjkyODU4?email%3D24dcs053@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dcs053@charusat.edu.in>

From: Deepti Pillai <deepti@sstarsfoundation.org>

Subject: Invitation to Nominate Girl Students for WWT All India Women-Only
Hackathon 2025
To: Professor <atulpatel.mca@charusat.ac.in>


*Dear Professor *

I hope this message finds you well.

I am Dr. Deepti Pillai, formerly with CodeChef and currently serving as
Director ‚Äì Community at *Shooting Stars Foundation*, a non-profit committed
to advancing access to STEM education and entrepreneurship for underserved
communities.

We are delighted to invite your *girl students* to participate in the
upcoming
*WWT All India Women-Only Hackathon 2025*, organized in partnership with *World
Wide Technology*, a leading US-based IT services company.
Hackathon Highlights:

   -

   *Open to all women college students* (any stream, any year)
   -

   *Theme:* *AI for Financial Inclusion of Women ‚Äì Economic Empowerment &
   Financial Literacy*
   -

   *Mode:* Online
   -

   *Team Event:* 4‚Äì6 members (*No team? No problem ‚Äî we‚Äôll help form one!*)
   -

   *Prizes Worth ‚Çπ3,00,000 (1st/2nd/3rd/4th/5th prizes -
   50K/35K/25/15K/10K). A*ll top 25 teams standing a chance to win a
   minimum of ‚Çπ5,000
   -

   *Hackathon Date:* Sunday, July 13, 2025
   -

   *Last Date to Register: June 30, 2025*
   -

   *Registration Link:* www.starhacks.org/wwthackathon2025
   <https://email.shooting-stars-foundation.org//l/8ohqkV3IvFMrSSAZLmbOXg/1L3mRYYlKvNT1EbrEAqOBw/aznlpRaV3enicF4u4mWwng>

We would be truly grateful if you could share this opportunity with your
students or circulate it through your department WhatsApp/email groups. *A
brochure is attached* for easy sharing.
Institutional Recognition:

The college/university with the *highest number of active women
participants* will receive a *special mention* on our social media and in
exclusive communications to our corporate partners ‚Äî celebrating your
commitment to promoting gender diversity in tech.

Your encouragement could make a life-changing difference for your students,
empowering them to innovate, collaborate, and grow in a real-world setting.

Please feel free to reach out for any queries.



With warm regards
*Dr. Deepti Pillai*
*Shooting Stars Foundation*
*Bengaluru, India*
*LinkedIn
<https://email.shooting-stars-foundation.org//l/8ohqkV3IvFMrSSAZLmbOXg/m9a763HEpcykAcx90ar4Sjhg/aznlpRaV3enicF4u4mWwng>|

subject: ‚è≥ Final Reminder For CHARUSAT Students ‚Äì Confirm Your Spot for IIT Kharagpur (Kshitij) Internship!
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT, üéì Congratulations! You've been shortlisted for the upcoming Training & Internship Program (June‚ÄìJuly-August Batch) hosted by EdiGlobe, in collaboration with IIT
content:
Dear Students of CHARUSAT,

üéì Congratulations! You've been shortlisted for the upcoming Training &
Internship Program (June‚ÄìJuly-August Batch) hosted by EdiGlobe, in
collaboration with IIT Kharagpur (Kshitij) and global tech leaders like
IBM, Wipro, Microsoft, Adobe, Meta and more.



*üëâ Don‚Äôt forget to submit the application form for the Internship.  *


 *Submit Your Application* <https://forms.gle/azB3cbY4gfYWttV97>


  üìù Feel free to share this with any friends or batchmates who didn't
receive it.



üìö Available Learning Formats:

*1Ô∏è‚É£ Self-Paced Program*
‚Äì All sessions are recorded
‚Äì Complete access to the LMS Portal for a duration of 6 months

*2Ô∏è‚É£ Blended Program*
‚Äì Sessions are recorded
‚Äì Weekly live sessions for clearing doubts

*3Ô∏è‚É£ Mentor-led / Live Program*
‚Äì Live classes via Zoom (2‚Äì3 times a week at 6:30 PM)
‚Äì Recordings available for review and flexibility


üèÜ After Completing the Program, You'll Receive:
‚úÖ Certificate of Completion ‚Äì from *IIT Kharagpur (Kshitij)*
‚úÖ Co-branded Internship Certificate ‚Äì from *IBM, Wipro, Microsoft, Meta,
Adobe, etc.*
‚úÖ *Letter of Recommendation* ‚Äì from top industry mentors
‚úÖ* Exclusive Community Access* ‚Äì connect with mentors and alumni
‚úÖ *Placement Assistance* ‚Äì get guided toward your dream role
*‚úÖ Stipend up to ‚Çπ15,000 ‚Äì based on performance*


Join us in a program designed to provide practical knowledge, hands-on
experience, and career advancement.


*Best regards,*

*Team Ediglobe*

subject: CAREER LAUNCHPAD INTERNSHIP PROGRAM | CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are thrilled to introduce the Career LaunchPad Program, a 3-stage, outcome-focused initiative designed exclusively for students of
content:
Dear Student of *Charotar University of Science and Technology,*

We are thrilled to introduce the *Career LaunchPad Program*, a 3-stage,
outcome-focused initiative designed exclusively for students of *CHARUSAT*.


Please fill out the *Admission Form*:
Admission form <https://forms.gle/DDjMnNEeBnEXV4pPA>
------------------------------
*Stage 1: Learn (Training)*

   -

   *Skill Training:* Master in-demand skills.
   -

   *Mentorship:* Get guidance from experts:
   ‚ñ´Ô∏è *Ayush Kumar* (Adobe)
   ‚ñ´Ô∏è *Harsh Vajpayee* (Sony India)
   ‚ñ´Ô∏è *Aastha Kanupriya* (Capgemini)
   -

   *Masterclass:* Insights from CXOs of Fortune 500 companies.

*Stage 2: Build (Internship)*

   -

   *Live Projects:* Work on 10+ projects, including a Capstone Project.
   -

   *Real Experience:* Solve real-world problems with startups.

*Stage 3: Launch & Create Your Own Product*

   -

   *Founder Sessions:* Learn MVP Building, Pitching & Scaling.
   -

   *Career Tools:* Resume building, mock interviews, and job opportunities.

------------------------------
*Certification & Program Benefits:*

   -

   *Course Completion Certificate* accredited by *NSDC Skill India*

   *Internship Completion Certificate* verified with a unique *Wipro DICE

subject: MANDATORY SUMMER INTERNSHIP OPPORTUNITIES FOR STUDENTS
snippet: Dear Student , Congratulations on getting Shortlisted for the Internship! Launched Global organizing a 2-Month Training + Internship Program with certifications from MNCs in both technical and non-
content:
*Dear Student **, Congratulations on getting Shortlisted for the
Internship! *

*Launched Global organizing a 2-Month Training + Internship Program with
certifications from MNCs in both technical and non-technical domains. *

 * We are thrilled to announce the Internship and Placement Assistance for
the students, all over India. *

*Students Kindly Go Through All The Information Which Is Mentioned In the
Description Of the  Google Form, **Before Filling the Form:*

*Application
Form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfCwcXMx3IWl7KnTLafQ_68amKtZCn26mLlnfONqWsDkwr4MA/viewform?usp=header
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfCwcXMx3IWl7KnTLafQ_68amKtZCn26mLlnfONqWsDkwr4MA/viewform?usp=header>*

*Certifications/Internships Reports can be submitted to the departments for
the Academic Credit Points.*

*Program Highlights*

*Immer**sive Training Sessions:*

   - Dive into an *exceptional learning experience*, curated by
   professionals from *MAANG companies*, each bringing over *10 years of
   industry expertise*.
   - The program offers *80+ hours of high-quality content*, spread
across *25-30
   dynamic modules*, designed to equip you with cutting-edge skills.

          *  (Login credentials will be provided to the students after
registration)*

* Hands-On Internship under MNCs:*

   - Get deployed directly with one of our partner *MNCs*, where you‚Äôll
   work on *10+ live projects*, solving real-world challenges.
   - Collaborate with industry professionals, gaining valuable practical
   experience and a deeper understanding of your field.
   - *All data, tools, and resources for the projects will be provided by
   the company, ensuring you're set up for success from day one.*

*Post-Program Benefits:*

   - Program completion certificate issued by* Launched Global*
   - Co-branded* Internship Certificate from Top MNCs*
   - Admittance to a *growing community*.
   - *Low-Code and No-Code Tools* training.
   - *100% Outcome-Driven Results*.
   - Curriculum includes *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - *Exclusive Masterclasses* with Founders and CXOs of Top Global
   Companies.
   - *Personalized mentorship* for proper guidance.

*We look forward to your active participation in the Training and
Internship Program. This is an excellent chance for you to broaden your
horizons and take a step towards a successful career. For any inquiries or
assistance, feel free to contact us.*

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Infosys Springboard <springboard@infosys.com>
Date: Wed, 28 May, 2025, 6:07 pm
Subject: Infosys Springboard Virtual Internship 6.0: Apply Now!
To:






*Dear Learner,*

We are happy to announce the launch of the *6th edition for Infosys
Springboard Virtual Internship*! Our internship program has been a
launchpad for aspiring enthusiasts, providing a platform to work on
real-world projects and gain exposure to the latest technologies. The
previous batches have seen interns excel and move forward with a wealth of
knowledge and practical experience.

*What‚Äôs in it for you?*



   1. *In-depth Technical Knowledge:* Gain hands-on experience in your
   chosen field of technology.
   2. *Project-Based Learning:* Gain practical experience of working on a
   project.
   3. *Expert Guidance:* Learn from industry leaders and become part of a
   community of like-minded individuals.



*Who can apply?*



   - Applicants must have passed 12th Standard or equivalent or higher
   examination from a recognized Board or University and must be pursuing
   graduation/post-graduation or completed graduation.



*How to Apply?*



   1. *Visit the Channel Page*: Go through the instructions in detail
   listed on the Virtual Internship 6.0 channel page.
   2. *Choose Your Interest Area*: Once you've reviewed the instructions,
   you can then pick any area you'd be most interested in for the projects,
   such as AI, Angular Full Stack, Python, Java Tech Stack or Data
   Visualization.
   3. *Complete the Application*: Fill out the internship application form
   as detailed on the channel page.

*Click here to Visit & Apply*
<https://infyspringboard.onwingspan.com/web/en/page/lex_auth_01398268320967884838>



The deadline to apply for Internship is *June 2, 2025,* and the deadline to
complete recommended courses of your chosen technology theme is *June 30,
2025*.



In case of queries, write to springboard-support@infosys.com.




*Regards, Team Infosys Springboard*

the * Infosys Springboard App*

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, May 28, 2025, 7:41 PM Subject: Fwd: Proposal for Students to Participate in the UnTechEd Japan
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, May 28, 2025, 7:41 PM
Subject: Fwd: Proposal for Students to Participate in the UnTechEd Japan
International Education Study Tour: July 2025Proposal for Students to
Participate in the UnTechEd Japan International Education Study Tour: July
2025
To: Teaching Staff <teachingstaff@charusat.ac.in>, Registrar CHARUSAT <
registrar@charusat.ac.in>, Deputy Registrar (Academics & Exams) CHARUSAT <
dy.registrar.ace@charusat.ac.in>




*Dr R.V. Upadhyay,*
*Provost (Vice-Chancellor),*

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA
https://charusat.irins.org/profile/156375
c: +91 9427215242 | ph: +91 2697 265015 | e: provost@charusat.ac.in
<registrar@charusat.ac.in> | w: www.charusat.ac.in


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Manshi Verma <communications@unteched.in>
Date: Wed, 28 May 2025, 18:12
Subject: Proposal for Students to Participate in the UnTechEd Japan
International Education Study Tour: July 2025Proposal for Students to
Participate in the UnTechEd Japan International Education Study Tour: July
2025
To: provost@charusat.ac.in <provost@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Dr. RV Upadhyay

Greetings from UnTechEd!

We are thrilled to present an extraordinary opportunity for your students
to join the *UnTechEd International Education Study Tour: Japan 2025*,
titled *"Go Abroad, Unlock Your Potential."* Hosted *in partnership with
FPT Academy Japan*, this immersive *one-week program* combines academic
excellence with cultural exploration, offering a transformative experience
for participants.

*Program Overview:*

*Host Country: Tokyo, Japan*
*Host University Partner: FPT Academy Japan*
*Duration: 14 July ‚Äì 20 July, 2025 (7 Days / 6 Nights)*

Participants will gain hands-on exposure through academic sessions,
workshops, and cultural immersion activities. This program is specifically
designed to broaden global perspectives, enhance professional skills, and
provide an unforgettable learning adventure.

*Program Highlights:*

*1. Academic Sessions: *Led by top experts, students will delve into
trending topics such as:

   - AI Application in Business
   - Digital Transformation
   - Cybersecurity in Business
   - Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion


*2. Field Trip at a Global Company (All in English)*

   - Welcome Ceremony & Company Tour
   - Seminar with Experts
   - Skill-up Workshop
   - Groupwork


*3. Experience Japanese Culture*

   - Calligraphy Culture Class with Japanese Teacher
   - Unique insights into Japanese lifestyle
   - Immersive cultural activities and sightseeing


*Program Cost:*

*Program Fee: 1100 USD (approx. INR 93,500)*
(Note: Payment to be paid in International account, Additional 18% GST
applicable for payments to an Indian account.)

*Inclusions:*

   - 6 Nights Accommodation in dormitories (shared basis)
   - Local airport transfers (group pick-up & drop)
   - Local transport for program-related visits
   - Orientation and in-program activity fees (including transportation &
   entrance tickets)
   - Study materials and printing fees
   - An English-speaking buddy to assist students during program activities
   - Certificate of Participation from FPT Japan


*Exclusions:* Flights, Visa Fee, Meals, Travel & Health Insurance, Personal
Expenses

***UnTechEd will assist students with flight bookings and visa lodgement.*

*Registration Link: https://forms.gle/BoY9ncAxtSUhY5S86
<https://forms.gle/BoY9ncAxtSUhY5S86>*

*Encourage your students to register early to secure their spots.*

This program is an excellent way for students to enhance their academic
profiles, gain global exposure, and immerse themselves in Japan's rich
culture. We look forward to collaborating with you to make this initiative
a success.

For any queries or assistance, please feel free to contact us. We look
forward to your students joining us on this exciting journey to explore the
vibrant culture of Japan

Thanks & Regards,

--

snippet: . Dear Student, CHARUSAT Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Online Summer Internship & Training Program, organized by Krutanic Solutions for CHARUSAT students. Fill the form by today
content:
I've invited you to fill out the following form:
Summer Internship by Accenture: Apply for the 2k25 Internship Program

To fill it out, visit:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOI5NpjTjq-Ovm8bkQOAsck67jKea5A4ZEm82__5iHwY0gHw/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1&flr=0&usp=mail_form_link

Dear Student,
CHARUSAT

Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Online Summer Internship &  
Training Program, organized by Krutanic Solutions for CHARUSAT students.

Fill the form by today before 8PM.

Program Structure:

Month 1: Live training sessions

Month 2: Project execution

Month 3: Resume and interview preparation

Letter of Recommendation.

National Training Coordinator
Krutanic Solutions

subject: Regarding submission of Skill Augmentation
snippet: Dear Students, You are hereby informed to submit the details of your Skill Augmentation Activities undertaken during your First Year (1st & 2nd Semester) on the Skill Augmentation Portal. This
content:
Dear Students,

You are hereby informed to submit the details of your *Skill Augmentation
Activities* undertaken during your *First Year (1st & 2nd Semester) on the
Skill Augmentation Portal*. This includes any *certifications, internships,
workshops, training programs, or technical courses* you have completed.

For submission, you are required to:

   -

   *Take a printout of your skill augmentation portal's dashboard*
   -

   *Submit the hard copy to your respective counselor*

Kindly ensure the submission is completed *on or before your official
submission date*.




*With regards,*
*Ankita Amaravat*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)*- Changa,

contact numbers in your respective e-Gov profiles. You are hereby

subject: Internship & Training Program for CHARUSAT Students | Industry-Endorsed | 8 Seats | Apply by Tomorrow 12 PM
snippet: . Dear Student, Students from CHARUSAT now have access to a structured Online Summer Training & Internship Program, supported by industry partners including Accenture and Wipro, and organized by
content:
I've invited you to fill out the following form:
Advance Your Career with Accenture-Verified Training and Internships

To fill it out, visit:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfhiob3wud-MIiXdVNWIl7dtQSWnoz7fW7VyB0Gbcz9sWJsUw/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1&flr=0&usp=mail_form_link

Dear Student,

Students from CHARUSAT now have access to a structured Online Summer  
Training & Internship Program, supported by industry partners including  
Accenture and Wipro, and organized by Krutanic Solutions.

This is a 2‚Äì3 month program aimed at building your technical foundation,  
enhancing your resume with real project work, and preparing you for  
upcoming placement opportunities. Only 8 seats are available for this  
intake.

What the Program Offers
üìò Month 1 ‚Äì Training

Live expert sessions on current tools and technologies

One-on-one guidance and doubt-clearing sessions

All sessions conducted online (Zoom/Google Meet)

üõ†Ô∏è Month 2 ‚Äì Internship Projects

Minor project (7 days) + Major project (23 days)

Hands-on work based on real scenarios

Work independently and in small teams

üéØ Month 3 ‚Äì Career Support (Optional)

Resume writing and LinkedIn profile reviews

Practice interviews and communication workshops

Support for placement preparation

Certification & Recognition
‚úÖ Internship Certificate from Accenture & Wipro
‚úÖ Course Certificate (AICTE & ISO Certified) ‚Äì Krutanic Solutions
‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation from project mentors
‚úÖ Excellence Certificate for top performers

Quick Info
üéì For: CHARUSAT Students

üóìÔ∏è Apply by: Tomorrow, before 12:00 PM

üíª Mode: 100% Online

üí∞ Fee: One-time program fee applies

If you‚Äôre looking to gain experience and stand out during placements, this  
program is a solid step forward.

For registration or any questions, simply reply to this message.

Best regards,
Venkata
National Training Coordinator
Krutanic Solutions

Dear All,

The submission process for the subject MEUD101 - Elements of Engineering is
as follows:

For Engineering Graphics Sheets:

1. Students must submit their A2-size drawing sheets and  binders on both
sides.
Sequence is as follows: Binder - Sheet - 1 - Sheet - 2 - Binder
All the sheets should be of A2 size.
[image: image.png]


2. Colour code of the binder is as follows:

Department Institute Colour Code
CE CSPIT & DEPSTAR YELLOW
CSE CSPIT & DEPSTAR BLUE
IT CSPIT & DEPSTAR GREEN
AIML CSPIT BLACK
EC CSPIT PINK

3. No need to stick the Certificate and Index on the binder.
(as the certificate and index are already available in your lab manual)

4. At the time of Practical Exam (Viva) students have to bring Lab
Sketchbook (signed by faculty), Sheets as mentioned above, Assignment
sketch book (signed by class teacher), Lab manual and assignment of
Mechanical & Civil.


You can contact your respective lab/lecture faculties for submission.

subject: New announcement: "Important instruction and location for‚Ä¶"
snippet: Notification settings CEUC102 - Programming with C++ New announcement Important instruction and location for Practical & Viva exam of CEUC102 - Programming with C++ Dear Students, University
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s?email%3D24dcs053@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dcs053@charusat.edu.in>
CEUC102 - Programming with C++  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzMzMzU1MTE1OTI4?email%3D24dcs053@charusat.edu.in&Email=24dcs053@charusat.edu.in>
New announcement

Important instruction and location for Practical & Viva exam of CEUC102 -  
Programming with C++

Dear Students,

University Practical/Viva Examination of the subject CEUC102 - Programming  
with C++ for 2nd Semester B.Tech (CSE) students is scheduled on 26th May  
2025.

Reporting time is 9.05 AM. Practical exam time is 9.30 AM to 12.30 PM.

Practical Venue:
Roll No.                              Location
24DCS001 to 24DCS043    317
24DCS044 to 24DCS085    314
24DCS086 to 24DCS107    312
24DCS0108 to 24DCS129   313
24DCS130 to 24DCS151    316

Viva Venue:
Roll No.                             Location
24DCS001 to 24DCS050    317
24DCS051 to 24DCS100    314
24DCS101 to 24DCS151    316

Important Instructions:

    -
    - All students must wear their University ID card throughout the  
examination.
    - Be seated by 9:05 AM at your designated lab. Attendance will be marked  
before the examination begins.
    - The examination will continue until all students have completed their  
Practical/Viva. It is a total of 3 hours.
    - Strict discipline must be maintained during the examination. No  
student will be allowed to roam in the lobby. You are informed to remain  
seated in your designated lab, maintaining proper manners, discipline, and  
the decorum of the examination.
    - Viva Rubrics (Total - 5 marks): Core Concepts (3 marks), Application  
of Concepts (1 marks), Communication Effectiveness (1 mark)
    - Practical Rubrics (Total - 20 marks): Problem Implementation (6  
Marks), Coding Standards & Use of Modern C++ Features (4 Marks), Test Case  
Implementation (10 Marks)

Note:
It is mandatory to adhere to all the above instructions to ensure the

subject: Earn Certificates from Microsoft for CHARUSAT University Students‚Äì Join Our Online Internship!
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT University Students, We're thrilled to announce that you've been selected for the SmartED Off-Campus Drive in collaboration with Microsoft, endorsed by IIT Madras and Startup
content:
Dear  *CHARUSAT University*  Students,

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce that you‚Äôve been selected for the SmartED
Off-Campus Drive in collaboration with Microsoft, endorsed by IIT Madras
and Startup India!

*Key Highlights:*

   - *Program Duration:* 2 months with flexible start dates.
   - *Training Areas:* Dive into Data Science, AI & ML, Web & Game
   Development, Cyber Security, and more!
   - *Completion Certificates:* Earn a Work Experience/Internship
   Certificate, Course Completion Certificate, and a Letter of Recommendation
   based on your performance.

*Next Steps:* To begin your onboarding process, please complete the
following form: *Onboarding Form*. :

https://forms.gle/k7mfrXasjzw2w6Cw6



*IMPORTANT: Training charges will be applicable.**REFERRAL CODE: INT25*

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out at +91 9110870696. We‚Äôre
here to help!

Congratulations once again, and we look forward to welcoming you on board!

Best regards,
Deepak R

subject: Fwd: Online Training Programme on ‚ÄúTransforming Research and Learning with ScienceDirect‚Äù
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!!! Those interested in research and/or working in the research direction of any domain can participate and take advantage of the session and the research facilities provided by
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!!

Those interested in research and/or working in the research direction of
any domain can participate and take advantage of the session and the
research facilities provided by the university.



*Thanks and Regards,*
*RADHIKA H. PATEL*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Information Technology*
*DEPSTAR,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa*







---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Library CHARUSAT <head.lib@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, May 21, 2025 at 10:49‚ÄØAM
Subject: Online Training Programme on ‚ÄúTransforming Research and Learning
with ScienceDirect‚Äù
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dean CHARUSAT <dean@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Library Users,

We are pleased to invite you to a *‚ÄúTransforming Research and Learning with
ScienceDirect‚Äù,* an online training programme organized by *CHARUSAT -
Knowledge Resource Centre (KRC)*, for one of the premier e-resources
subscribed to by our university, aimed at enhancing academic and research
excellence.

*ScienceDirect*, by Elsevier, provides access to a vast collection of
scientific journals, books, and articles across a wide range of
disciplines, including: *Pharmacy, Applied Science, Computer Applications,
and engineering.* This initiative will help you:

   - Discover authoritative research content
   - Improve the quality of your academic and research work
   - Stay updated with the latest developments in your field

[image: image.png]

We encourage all faculty members, researchers, and students to participate
actively in this session and make the most of this valuable resource.

*Kindly confirm your **registration on:*



https://tinyurl.com/4vvzb8ua

*Note: *All participants will be awarded with an *E-Certificate* of
participation.


Thank you so much, and we look forward to your participation.

Regards,

Dr. Pramod D. Patel
University Librarian
R K Patel Knowledge Resource Centre
CHARUSAT campus,Changa-388421
Mob:- 09879334259
Landline No:02697-265032

subject: MANDATORY WIPRO SUMMER INTERNSHIP AND AICTE APPROVED INTERNSHIP
snippet: Transform Your Career with Our Exclusive Training & Internship Program! DEAR STUDENT OF CHARUSAT We are excited to announce a unique opportunity in collaboration with NIT Durgapur and Wipro DICE ID
content:
Transform Your Career with Our Exclusive Training & Internship Program!

DEAR STUDENT OF CHARUSAT
We are excited to announce a unique opportunity in collaboration with NIT
Durgapur and Wipro DICE ID, offering a prestigious 2-month Training+
Internship program with certifications from industry giants like CISCO,
META|FACEBOOK, IBM, and various other renowned MNCs in technical and
non-technical domains, with key highlights including placement assistance,
limited seats available, and enhanced career prospects

*Note: If any of your batchmates are missed or haven't received the
notification, recipients are allowed to send this mail to them.*

It is Mandatory for students to submit their application. If you get
shortlisted, you will be getting a call from our HR Team:
*Submit Your Application* <https://forms.gle/k86LWXSJYNX9LQDQ8>
Program Details:Program Overview:

   - *Duration:* 2 months (1 Month of Training + 1 Month of Internship)
   - *Eligibility:* Limited seats available‚Äîensure you apply early to
   secure your place.

Program Structure:*First Month: Expert Training*

   - Live lectures and mentorship from seasoned industry professionals with
   10+ years of experience.
   - Access to online course materials and recorded sessions.
   - *Learning Focus:* In-depth theoretical and practical knowledge in both
   technical and non-technical domains.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - *Internship Projects:*
      - *Project 1:* 10 individual projects for each intern, designed to
      enhance real-world problem-solving skills.
      - *Project 2:* A collaborative Capstone Project, where groups of 15
      interns will work together under mentor guidance.
   - *Mentorship:* Ongoing live mentorship for projects, offering insights
   and practical experience in solving industry-specific challenges.

Class Formats:

*Blended Program:* Access to recorded classes and live doubt clearing
sessions every weekend.

*Mentor-led/Live Classes:* Live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM for 3 to 4days a
week, with recorded sessions available.

*LMS Portal:* Access for 12 months.
Certification:

After completion of the program, students will receive:

   - *Program completion certificate issued by WIPRO*
   - *Co-branded internship certificate from top MNCs.*
   - *100% placement assistance.*
   - *Access to a thriving professional community.*
   - *WIPRO DICE Certification.*

*Submit Your Application* <https://forms.gle/k86LWXSJYNX9LQDQ8>



*Congratulations to students who have already been selected for our
programs:*

Essential Series* at a heavily discounted *academia rate of ‚Çπ7,022 per

students with practical cybersecurity skills across a range of key domains:

üìö *Courses Available:*

   7. DevSecOps Essentials

üîç *What‚Äôs Included with Each Course:*

   - üéØ Capture the Flag style exercises  (Excluding DSE & CSE)

Greetings!!!

Kindly go through the trailing mail. Interested students working in this

*CHARUSAT, Changa*

Hi Tech Enthusiasts,

Got big ideas? We‚Äôve got the platform.

*Introducing GrabHack 2025:*
<http://delivery.dare2compete.news/WPCGSVUABDHQ?id=182672=e0hRAQFXA1MGTwZTUQJVAAAEB1EMUFoKVwZZBwBUBQdaBQAEAAQMBlIBVQFQVFJXAlBIVVMBAAsEAwEDAgMAV15XAAYKUgVUUQsCA1QLVgdTU1BSBQMADVcLDwcPAVsAClcAAQhRB1ZSBlNQUQFWVQFSBBoEA1cPAwYPAAYFUAUKBFMEARldEEBDCx5NVlUIDRBRFEwaB1lDVwpXWV8TUExRT15cEkZLY2NydjFkZSUmInw3Cl0HREcB&fl=UEAVQEpfGktZXFRuEkVTDkoHRA8YBFAWXF1dWlFTBFAWVw5dFhMES1FeUFgOUVwNBw0=&>
Shaping the Future ‚Äì India‚Äôs premier hackathon for the brightest tech
minds. Solve real-world challenges, build innovative AI solutions, and
secure your chance to interview at Grab. It‚Äôs your opportunity to join the
team that‚Äôs reimagining how Southeast Asia moves.

This isn‚Äôt just another hackathon. It‚Äôs your launchpad.

*Who can join?*
Working professionals in the tech space with 1+ year of experience ‚Äì across
any specialization.

*Interview Opportunity at Grab* for Finalists

Cash Prize Pool of *INR 6 Lakhs*

Exclusive *Welcome Kit* at the Grand Finale

*24-Hour Hackathon* at the Grab Bangalore office

<http://delivery.dare2compete.news/WPCGSVUABDHQ?id=182672=e0hRAQFXA1MGTwZXBFEFAF0CAVACVlQNBgcPBAMEAQUPBVQDDVJQBgdRAglQBQZQVVBIVVMBAAsEAwEDAgMAV15XAAYKUgVUUQsCA1QLVgdTU1BSBQMADVcLDwcPAVsAClcAAQhRB1ZSBlNQUQFWVQFSBBoEA1cPAwYPAAYFUAUKBFMEARldEEBDCx5NVlUIDRBRFEwaB1lDVwpXWV8TUExRT15cEkZLY2NydjFkZSUmInw3Cl0HREcB&fl=UEAVQEpfGktZXFRuEkVTDkoHRA8YBFAWXF1dWlFTBFAWVw5dFhMES1FeUFgOUVwNBw0=&>


Let‚Äôs shape what‚Äôs next in AI‚Äîtogether.
See you at the top!

Regards,

Team GrabHack 2025

snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, We are excited to announce the upcoming ARTHYANTRA CHARUSAT Tech Team and Content Creation Team Recruitments for 2025. Interested students are required to fill out the Google
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

We are excited to announce the upcoming ARTHYANTRA CHARUSAT Tech
Team and Content Creation Team Recruitments for 2025.

Interested students are required to fill out the Google Form by May 30th
2025. We appreciate your interest and encourage you to participate.

The link to access the form is https://forms.gle/6M3kMDQjVVoEy25y8


For any queries or further information, please contact:
Vansh Malani (9023046891) (President)
Nandini Sherwani(9265737966) (Vice-President)

Best Regards,
Team Arthyantra
(Charusat Economics Club)

subject: Nomenclature Competition I Multi Utility Building @ CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, CHARUSAT is excited to invite your creative suggestions for naming our Multi-Utility Complex. The facility is a versatile space for CSIC, CIVF, HRDC, COE, IT Cell, IQAC, conference rooms
content:
Dear Students,

CHARUSAT is excited to invite your creative suggestions for *naming our
Multi-Utility Complex.*
The facility is a versatile space for CSIC, CIVF, HRDC, COE, IT Cell, IQAC,
conference rooms, paperless exam halls, an exam control room, and
multitudes of related services. It is designed to cater to the diverse
needs of CHARUSAT's unique initiatives and will play a pivotal role in
enhancing the overall campus experience.


*Criteria for Nomenclature:*

   - Should reflect Vedic/Sanskrit terminology‚Äîeasily memorable
   - Should be meaningful and relevant to the facility
   - Should have Clarity, brevity, and creativity
   - Should have a touch of academia or knowledge


üéÅPrize: The best fit name will be awarded a cash prize of ‚Çπ11,000/- by the
prime donor of this facility, Shri Devang Patel (Nadiad).


Click to fill out the form <https://forms.gle/WDvwYgL4uC2DBHMi9>
*Deadline*: Submit your response before May 30, 2025.


*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*
