subject: Re: Important: CHARUSAT - Teaching of a Course on Liberal Arts - Academic Year 2024-25 || March 25-28, 2025
snippet: Dear Students, With the aspiration to be a World Class University, Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) has initiated various constructive actions for holistic development of
content:
Dear Students,


With the aspiration to be a *World Class University*, Charotar University
of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) has initiated various constructive
actions for holistic development of students of the University.



*Courses on Liberal Arts* offered by *Department of Humanities and Social
Sciences* *(HSS)* under *Faculty of Humanities (FoH)* to all the students
of *Second semester* of all constituent institutes of CHARUSAT is one of
them.



*With the kind cooperation and support of all the constituent institutes
and Departments of CHARUSAT*, courses on Liberal Arts have been taught to
the students in Workshop Mode, consistently for TEN fruitful years wherein
courses like ‚Äì *Painting, Photography, Sculpting, Pottery and Ceramic Art,
Media and Graphic Design,** Art & Craft, Contemporary Dance *and
*Dramatics* are
offered to students. Along with these courses, additional courses like *Music
(Vocal), **Music (Instrumental- Tabla**, Guitar, **Harmonium, Flute**,
Indian Classical Dance ‚Äì Kathak and **Bharatnatyam* are to be offered to
the students from this academic year.



Anticipating the same support and cooperation, this Academic year (2024-25)
in Even Semester, the Courses on Liberal Arts are scheduled to be offered
in Workshop Mode from *March 25 to 28, 2025.* Workshop kits for the
students will be distributed on* March 24, 2025* (from 9:30 am to 4:00 pm)
in different slots at Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management on Monday.
Every Institute/Department will be intimated about their slots.


Kindly book these dates and plan other activities accordingly.


* Information Points for the Students*


   1. The Courses of Liberal Arts will be offered / conducted in a *Workshop
   Mode from 9:10 am to 4:30 pm* on all the *FOUR days* i.e. *March 25-28,
   2025.*
   2. Each course of Liberal Arts is a 2 Credit Course.
   3. *Students are required to collect a Kit*. It will be available at
   Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management on *Monday - March 24,
2025* *(from
   9:30 am to 4:00 pm)* in different slots. Every Institute/Department will
   be intimated about their slots
   4. Students must bring the Kit everyday and take care of the materials
   and instruments given to them. In case, if something is lost, concerned
   students will be required to manage it.
   5. *100% Attendance is Compulsory*.
   6. Students need to report in Time (at least *10 minutes before* the
   stipulated time).
   7. They must perform the Practical or do the tasks as assigned to them.
   8. As the external Resource Persons are invited, students are also
   required to maintain discipline and decorum befitting the students of a
   university and professional programs.
   9. It is required that every student carries their own Identity Card.
   10. During the Workshop, students‚Äô submissions will also be taken.
   11. *Internal as well as External Evaluation will be carried out during
   those days.*
   12. Details of the Syllabus of the opted Course, evaluation scheme and
   other instructions will be provided to the students in their kit as well as
   via email.

In case of any query kindly contact Mr. Arpit Bhatt / Mr. Hardik Parmar.
Thanks & Regards,

*Mr. Hardik Parmar*
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Science & Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),

--

subject: Important: MSUD102 Practice Session Starting from March 18, 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Your tutorial (Practice Session for MSUD102) will commence on March 18, 2025. This session is part of continuous evaluation, and your attendance is mandatory. If you are absent for even
content:
Dear Students,

Your tutorial (Practice Session for MSUD102) will commence on *March 18,
2025*. This session is part of *continuous evaluation*, and your attendance
is *mandatory*.

*If you are absent for even one session, we will inform your parents*.
Please ensure your participation to avoid any issues.

 Each class has been divided into *two equal partitions*, and sessions will
be conducted by *two different faculty members*. Please *check your ID
number in the attached file* and ensure that you always *sit in your
allotted classroom* throughout the sessions.

Thank you.
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*

subject: Invitation to Participate in Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025
snippet: Dear Students, The CHARUSAT NSS Cell is pleased to invite you to participate in the Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025, an incredible opportunity to express your vision for a developed India. This
content:
Dear Students,

The *CHARUSAT NSS Cell* is pleased to invite you to participate in the *Viksit
Bharat Youth Parliament 2025*, an incredible opportunity to express your
vision for a developed India. This initiative, supported by the *Ministry
of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of India*, encourages youth engagement in
policy discussions and leadership development.
*Event Details:*

*District-Level Competition:* 17th March 2025
*Venue:* Sardar Patel University, Vallabh Vidyanagar

*Register Here:* https://mybharat.gov.in/ -> Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament
2025 <https://mybharat.gov.in/mega_events/viksit-bharat-youth-parliament>
(*Register as soon as possible!*)
*Deadline : 16th March 2025*
*Participation Guidelines:*

   - Open to students aged *18-25 years*.
   - Submit a *1-minute video* on the topic: *"What does Viksit Bharat mean
   to you?"*
   - Language options: *Gujarati, Hindi, or English*.
   - *Selected 150 participants* will compete at the District Level.
   - *Top 10* will advance to the State Level, and winners will qualify for
   the *National Level* competition.

For detailed guidelines and further information, please find the *attached
PDF*.

*We encourage all eligible students to take advantage of this opportunity
and make CHARUSAT proud! *

For any queries, feel free to contact the *CHARUSAT **NSS Cell*.
-- 
Thanks & Regards
--

--

To: principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: President Student Senate -SAC <president.ssenate@iitram.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,



Greetings from IITRAM, Ahmedabad!



We are excited to invite Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and
Research (DEPSTAR) to FLUX 2025, our annual Tech Fest, which will be held
on March 21st, 22nd, and 23rd, 2025. This event brings together students
from various institutions to compete, innovate, and collaborate in a series
of technical, entrepreneurial, and cultural activities.



Event Highlights:

Technical Competitions ‚Äì AI Innovation Sprint, DSA Showdown, Startup Idea
Pitch, UX/UI Challenge, and more.

Workshops & Hackathons ‚Äì Hands-on learning experiences with industry
experts.

Cultural Night (March 23rd) ‚Äì Live performances by Piyush Sharma and DJ
Honey.



We invite students from your esteemed institution to participate and make
this event memorable. We kindly request your support in sharing this
information with your students.



Event details can be found in the brochure attached with this email.



Registration Details:

Participants can register via QR code from the Event Poster.



For any queries or additional materials, please contact us using E-mail
president.ssenate@iitram.ac.in or contact +91-9925601044 , +91-8238020472 .





Best Regards,

Rajkotiya Devkrishna

Organizing Committee

FLUX, 2025

IITRAM , Ahmedabad

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 9:27 AM Subject: Fwd: Call for Student Entries ‚Äì FICCI Best Animated

Awards 2025 | Send entries latest by 15 March 2025

From: FICCI FRAMES <frames@ficci.com>
Date: Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 4:41‚ÄØPM
Subject: Call for Student Entries ‚Äì FICCI Best Animated Frames (BAF) Awards
2025 | Send entries latest by 15 March 2025
To: principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in <principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in>



Dear Academician,

Greetings from FICCI!

*We are pleased to invite students from your Institute/ University to send
their entries for BAF Awards 2025 across various categories - Animation,
Visual Effects (VFX), Gaming, Comics, and Extended Reality (AVGC-XR).* This
is a unique opportunity for aspiring creators to gain national recognition
and showcase their talent amongst industry veterans, studios, and
decision-makers.

*Best Animated Frames (BAF) Awards ceremony will take place on March 27,
2025, at Sofitel, Mumbai.*

*Award Categories for Students:*

   - Best Student Short Film (2D & 3D Animation)
   - Best Student Character Design
   - Best Student Game Design & Development
   - Best Student Visual Effects (VFX) Project
   - Best Student Comic or Graphic Novel
   - Best Student XR (AR/VR/MR) Experience


*Why should Students participate in BAF Awards 2025?*
‚úî Gain National Recognition ‚Äì Showcase your work to industry leaders and
global experts.
‚úî Engage with Top Creators ‚Äì Network with leading animation, gaming, and
VFX professionals.
‚úî Get Industry Insights ‚Äì Attend thought-provoking sessions on the latest
AVGC-XR trends.
‚úî Win Prestigious Awards ‚Äì Boost your career prospects with a BAF
Award-winning portfolio.
‚úî Showcase at FICCI FRAMES ‚Äì Your work could be featured at India‚Äôs biggest
M&E industry platform.

*Judging Criteria:*
A distinguished jury panel comprising renowned animators, game developers,
VFX supervisors, and industry experts will evaluate the entries based on
creativity, technical execution, and storytelling impact. Winning entries
will receive trophies, certificates, and industry-wide recognition,
providing an unparalleled boost to emerging talent.

*Timeline and Process:*

   - Submit your entries *before March 15, 2025* at
*https://registrations.ficci.com/baf/baf-reg-online.asp

subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat Hackathon
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 9:29 AM Subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 9:29‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>



Please motivate students. If any type of assistants is required, feel free
to contact HoDs or to me.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <info@gujgov.edu.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 12:42‚ÄØAM
Subject: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear,,

The Education Department, Gujarat has been doing persistent efforts to
institutionalize the Innovation & Startup Ecosystem in the State through
policy, platform, and processes. To augment the support system for
nurturing student Start-ups in the State, second edition of Student
Start-up and Innovation Policy (SSIP 2.0) was launched on 05 January 2022.

Under the Policy, various flagship initiatives have been envisaged through
which youth can get adequate opportunities to harness their creative
potential. We have pioneered various Open Innovation Programmes like
hackathon and executed them at a large-scale.

The 6th Edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù with special focus on
Artificial will be a step forward towards building smart and sustainable
solutions to complex challenges. In this edition of hackathon around 15,000
students are expected to participate and work on problem statements.
Challenges from various departments of the State Government, Public Sector
Undertakings, Municipal Corporations, District Collectorate, District
Panchayats and industries will be broadcasted to students across
universities, institutes, and schools.

The program will feature problem statements from various sectors providing
students with ample opportunities to engage in Artificial Intelligence and
other emerging technology-based solution- oriented projects. Moreover,
winning teams will not only receive cash prizes but also invaluable
mentorship support from nodal officers of government departments and
benefits from education department of Government of Gujarat, further
encouraging their pursuit of innovation and excellence.

We request all students from your institute to actively participate in 6th
edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic
opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and
innovative thinking. To get more details and further update regarding
registration process and list of sectors students can visit the following
link: https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem
statement online after registration and login in the portal.

Last date for Team registration is 10th March 2025 and synopsis Submission
is 14th March 2025.

Kindly share this with all your students and faculty members so that they
can participate in this event. For any query, please revert us at
ssipgujarat@gmail.com





*Team HackathonStudent Start-up and Innovation PolicyEducation Department,
Government of Gujarat3rd Floor, Block No:2 ,Karmayogi BhavanSector 10-A
382010*


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 2
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/cde86d8c0da7b957c934ecfd99c713dcf0d13606]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and

subject: "Internship_Career - B Tech 1st Year Students of CHARUSAT"
snippet: Dear Student bearing Enrollment ID 24DCS053 from CHARUSAT. Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Internship Program! LaunchEd Global in Collaboration IIT KHARAGPUR(Kshitij) is organising a 2-
content:
*Dear Student bearing Enrollment ID* *24DCS053** from CHARUSAT**.*

*Congratulations* on being shortlisted for the *Internship Program!*

*LaunchEd Global* in Collaboration *IIT KHARAGPUR(Kshitij)* is
organising a *2-month
Training & Internship Program with certifications from WIPRO Dice ID and
AICTE-approved.* Gain *industry-leading skills* and *real-world experience* to
advance your career!

*Fill out the Google Form today to reserve your place in the program:*

            *    https://forms.gle/HoEgTaGKnXJVXyXs6
<https://forms.gle/HoEgTaGKnXJVXyXs6>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information:*

 *  https://chat.whatsapp.com/DugPxWAAzjVA3jDxnzHvPi
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/DugPxWAAzjVA3jDxnzHvPi>*

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*
*1. Training Outline*

   - *Live Mentoring with Industry Experts:* Evening classes (6:30 PM -
   8:00 PM) are conducted live on the Zoom platform to fit your schedule. Get
   guidance at every step.
- *From Basics to Advanced:* Perfect for beginners and those looking to
   refine advanced skills, starting from scratch.
- *AI-Powered Development Made Easy*: Build applications with minimal
   coding, create innovative solutions using Generative AI, and easily design
   effective AI prompts.
- *LMS Access for Flexibility: *Recorded live sessions will be uploaded to
   the Learning Management System (LMS) and available for 6 months from the
   batch start date. Login credentials will be shared after registration,
   ensuring uninterrupted learning at your own pace.

*2. Internship Conduct*

   - *10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project,
   where students will work on projects related to each topic they are
   learning.
   - *Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and
   you will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
   assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
   data and materials for the project.
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certifications Provided*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from
   IIT-KHARAGPUR(Kshitij)
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a certificate from our partnered MNCs &
   StartUps.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Both the Certificates will be verified by
   WIPRO Dice ID
   - *100% Placement Assistance: *Join Our Growth Community for Direct
   Placement Support with Top Companies.

content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Amit Thakkar <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 11:55‚ÄØAM
Subject: Hands on Workshop on HIgh Performance Computing under Super
Computing Facility @ CHARUSAT
To: <21cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <22cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <
23cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: HOD Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <hodds@charusat.ac.in>,
Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>,
Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, CE CSPIT <ce.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, IT <
it@charusat.ac.in>, AIML <aiml@charusat.ac.in>, CSE CSPIT <
cse@charusat.ac.in>, Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>, Ritesh Patel <
riteshpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Harshul Yagnik <
harshulyagnik.cse@charusat.ac.in>


Hands-On Workshop on High Performance Computing

Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club at CHARUSAT

Dear Students and Faculty members,

We are excited to invite you to a two-day hands-on workshop on High
Performance Computing (HPC) at CHARUSAT. This workshop will provide you
with practical experience in parallel computing techniques and technologies.
*Workshop Details:*

üìÖ Date: 11-12 March 2025

üìç Venue: 323A, A6 Building

üë• Maximum participants: 40

üí∞ Registration: Free of cost

*Note:* E-certificates will be provided to participants with 100%
attendance and 100% allocated task submission.
About the Workshop

This workshop will introduce you to the Supercomputing Facility at
CSPIT-CHARUSAT. You'll gain hands-on experience with various parallel
computing paradigms including:

   - ‚Ä¢ GPU Programming with CUDA
   - ‚Ä¢ Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
   - ‚Ä¢ Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
   - ‚Ä¢ Multi-GPU training with PyTorch

Workshop Schedule
Time Day 1 (March 11) Day 2 (March 12)
9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Super computing in action - Transforming Science and
Innovation
Dr. Amit Thakkar
10:00 AM - 12:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
Dr. Ritesh Patel GPU Programming with CUDA (continued)
Dr. Ritesh Patel
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch Break Lunch Break
1:00 PM - 2:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP (continued)
Dr. Ritesh Patel Multi-GPU training with PyTorch
Mr. Harshal Yagnik
2:00 PM - 4:20 PM Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
Mr. Harshal Yagnik Multi-GPU training with PyTorch (continued)
Mr. Harshal Yagnik
Benefits

   - ‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with the Supercomputing Facility
   - ‚Ä¢ Learn from experts in the field of high-performance computing
   - ‚Ä¢ E-certificates for participants with 100% attendance and task
   completion
   - ‚Ä¢ Valuable skills for research and industry applications

Registration Information

The workshop is open to all students and faculty members. Registration is
required as seats are limited to 40 participants.

Limited seats available - Register today!
Register Now <#m_-8735407115577644845_>

Registration closes on March 9, 2025 or when all seats are filled

Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club |
CSPIT-CHARUSAT

"EMPOWERING THE POTENTIAL OF PARALLEL COMPUTING"


With Regards,

Amit Thakkar, Ph.D.
Professor & Head
Department of Computer Science & Engineering
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT)
Charotar University of Science & Technology.(CHARUSAT)
Jay Swaminarayan.

subject: Fwd: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in Engineering (WIE)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 9:36 am Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 9:36‚ÄØam
Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
Engineering (WIE)
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>



Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering Affinity
Group and Seminar talk on "Women Innovators in Tech: Success Stories and
Lessons Learned"

Newly Established IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering
Affinity Group invites all female students and faculties of CHARUSAT to
participate in the inauguration ceremony followed by a seminar talk.
About IEEE WIE

*Vision:* "To be globally recognized for its contributions in STEM fields.
Our goal is to facilitate the recruitment and retention of women in
technical disciplines globally. We envision a vibrant community of IEEE
women and men collectively using their diverse talents to innovate for the
benefit of humanity."

*Mission:* "To connect, support, and inspire women and girls worldwide, and
facilitate their recruitment and retention in STEM fields, fostering
technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity."
Guest Speaker
Ruzan Khambatta

A visionary entrepreneur, social innovator, and passionate advocate for
women's empowerment. Through her groundbreaking initiatives like Wajra O'
Force, PoliceHEART 1091, and Halla Bol, she has transformed thousands of
lives. Her success mantra? Small steps today lead to giant leaps tomorrow!

Learn more about Ruzan Khambatta <https://ruzankhambatta.com/wizzo1/>
Event Details

   - *Date:* *10th March 2025*
   - *Time:* *9:45 AM to 11:00 AM*
   - *Venue:* *2nd floor, Seminar hall, CSPIT EC-EE(A6 building), CHARUSAT*

This event is a milestone moment as we officially launch the Student
Chapter of WiE Society of IEEE, a dedicated community to uplift and support
women in technology. Whether you're a student, professional, or tech
enthusiast, this is an opportunity to connect, learn, and be part of a
movement that drives change.

E-Certificates will be provided to all the participants.

Let's come together to celebrate, empower, and innovate!
Register Here
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1YtXFaNHx3A12jsPhcPr6jRjZWwjOh48EskA9I3Ra9Mg/edit>

Looking forward to your presence!

Regards,

-- 
Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand, Gujarat, India.
M: 7874840344
https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Gzsxo-oAAAAJ&hl=en

--

subject: Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025 (University Level) || Registration Deadline: March 6, 2025, 8:00 PM
snippet: Dear CSPIT & DEPSTAR Students, The CHARUSAT NSS Unit is organizing the University Level Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025 as part of the initiative by the State NSS Department. We
content:
Dear CSPIT & DEPSTAR Students,

The CHARUSAT NSS Unit is organizing the *University Level Gujarat Cultural
Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025* as part of the initiative by the State NSS
Department. We invite interested students to participate and showcase their
oratory skills.

*Date:* March 8, 2025
*Time:* 12:15 PM (Updated) Onwards
*Venue: *RPCP Auditorium
*Levels:* University ‚Üí Zone ‚Üí State

*Topics (Choose One):*

   - Character Building for Nation Building
   - Importance of Constitution in a Citizen‚Äôs Life
   - Youth: The Future of the Nation ‚Äì Challenges and Responsibilities
   - Values, Morality, and Ethics: Pillars of Indian Culture
   - Developed India 2047: Vision for a Better Future

*Eligibility:* Participants must be born on or after January 1, 1999.
*Registration Deadline:* March 6, 2025, 8:00 PM


*Registration Link:* <goog_111173522>https://forms.gle/LPeLhMmYZheqgaRr9

For further details, please refer to the attached PDFs.

For any queries, contact:

   - *Mr. Kishan Patel* (NSS Coordinator) ‚Äì +91 97244 42255
   - *Mr. Dhruv Rupapara* (Student Coordinator) ‚Äì +91 63539 33976

*We encourage students to participate.*

Best Regards,
*NSS Unit, CHARUSAT*

---Thanks & Regards---
*Dhruv D. Rupapara*
2nd Year B.Tech. EC
NSS Student Coordinator
V.T. Patel Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering
CSPIT, CHARUSAT, Changa 388421
--

subject: Fwd: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (March 2025)
snippet: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is the official EC-Council Academia Partner since January 2020. We are immensely
content:
Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *110+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA

Anand Patel <anandpatel.me@charusat.ac.in>, Mr. Bhargav Shobhana <
bhargavshobhana.cv@charusat.ac.in>





Dear Students,
Please find the syllabus below for the *MEUD101 EOE Midterm Exam*. The
detailed points for chapters/units: 3,6 & 10, you can find it from the FY
Handbook/Syllabus booklet.

*1. Fundamentals of Engineering Drawing*
Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials, BIS
and ISO
Different types of lines used in engineering practice, methods of
projections as per SP 46-1988.
Engineering scale.
Title block, Types of line, Geometric construction,Dimensioning System
*3. Orthographic Projection*
*6. Introduction of Mechanical Engineering*
*10. Scope of Civil Engineering*
---

Regards,



*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*

Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,

subject: Congratulations Id no. 24dcs053! AICTE-Approved Internship for FRESHERS
snippet: Dear Student, Congratulations! You have been shortlisted for the April, May, June or July batches of our Training & Internship Program. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience
content:
*Dear Student,*

Congratulations! You have been shortlisted for the   * April,  May, June or
July batches*  of our Training & Internship Program. This is an excellent
opportunity to gain hands-on experience and industry-recognized
certifications.

*Program Details:*

   - *Duration:* 1 or 2 months (your choice)
   - *Mode:* 100% Remote
   - *Start Dates:* April, May, June, July

*Program Highlights:*

   - *Month 1 (Training):*
      - Expert-led sessions (10+ years of experience).
      - 10+ live projects and 25‚Äì30 modules.
      - 80+ hours of practical learning.
   - *Month 2 (Internship):*
      - Capstone project with expert mentorship.

*Benefits Upon Completion:*

   - Certification from *KSHITIJ** IIT KHARAGPUR*.
   - Co-branded internship certificate from MNCs and startups.
   - Letter of Recommendation from top professionals.
   - Microsoft Certification Exam training.
   - Placement assistance and community access.

*Reserve Your Spot:*
Complete your registration here:

*  Click to Register <https://forms.gle/A1ZcTh2kQ9N1q7Au6>*

*Last reminder for students those who have not applied*

*Seats are limited, so register early to secure your place*

*For questions, contact:*
*Digant Kumar*
Senior Executive
+91 96868 30276

digant.kumar@launched.org.in

Best regards,
*Digant Kumar*

subject: Fwd: Free Consultation for women & heavy discount in Mammography
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Charusat Hospital <coo.ch@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, 5 Mar, 2025, 12:53 pm Subject: Free Consultation for women & heavy discount in Mammography To
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Charusat Hospital <coo.ch@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 5 Mar, 2025, 12:53‚ÄØpm
Subject: Free Consultation for women & heavy discount in Mammography
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,
International Women's day fall on 08/03/25.
It gives us immense pleasure to announce that from the day of
"International Women's day" i e from  08/03/25 to 31/03/25 CHARUSAT
Hospital is passing the following benefits to the women.

1) THERE WILL NOT BE ANY CONSULTATION CHARGES IN O.P.D. FOR WOMEN FROM
08/03/25 TILL 31/03/25 ON ALL THE WORKING DAYS.

2) THERE WILL BE 70% DISCOUNT in the CHARGES FOR THE MAMMOGRAPHY, WHICH
WILL BE ONLY Rs 300/- INSTEAD OF Rs 1000/-.

So please circulate this message to the maximum number of your staff and
students so that they can take advantage of these schemes.

Dr Jagan Mazmudar
CHARUSAT HOSPITAL

--

subject: Re: Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for the First Year Students of Undergraduate Program of DEPSTAR (2024-25)
snippet: Dear Students, Please find the "Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel Merit-cum-Means Scholarship" for the First Year Students of Undergraduate Program of DEPSTAR
content:
*Dear Students,*


*Please find the "Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai
Patel Merit-cum-Means Scholarship" for the First Year Students of
Undergraduate Program of DEPSTAR (2024-25)*



*You are requested to send the filled form with documents received from the
eligible students latest by 28th march 2025.*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY*



 NOTICE


*Date: 05/03/2025*


Bhupendrabhai Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel
Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for the First Year Students of Undergraduate
Program of DEPSTAR (2024-25)



This is for information to all the concerned students that Bhupendrabhai
Narshibhai Patel & Kokilaben Bhupendrabhai Patel Merit-cum-Means
Scholarship will be awarded to Undergraduate program Student of *DEPSTAR *for
academic year 2024-25, with the following Criteria:
Eligibility Criteria to get Scholarship for the Academic Year 2024-25:



v  The Student of F Y B Tech whose 12th Standard result is more than 70
Percentage & family income is not more than Rs. 7 lacs will be eligible to
apply

v  To continue to be eligible for availing Scholarship, the Student has to
secure 7.00 CGPA or above at the end of every Year without a backlog.

v  In case, a student will not score a minimum 7.00 CGPA in a consecutive
Year, then scholarship will be awarded to another eligible student.

v  Students receiving Govt. / Donor / CHARUSAT / any other scholarship or
admitted under the Tuition Fee Waiver Scheme (TFWS) are not eligible to
apply.

v  The Scholarship will be awarded to maximum one eligible student of
DEPSTAR



*The forms for the scholarship are available and is to be submitted as
per following details:*



*Name of Institute*

*Forms to be collected from*

DEPSTAR

Mr. Dharmendra Patel



*Last Date of Submission of Form: 25.03.2025*





**Note: No Form will be accepted after the last date.*
Thanks & Regards,

*Mr. Hardik Parmar*
Assistant Professor,
Department of Computer Science & Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),

--

subject: Important Email: Clarification on Syllabus and Reading Material
snippet: Dear Students, In my last email, I shared the syllabus, and some of you raised concerns about a mismatch in section numbering. To clarify, please refer to the following reading material for Unit 2 and
content:
Dear Students,

In my last email, I shared the syllabus, and some of you raised concerns
about a mismatch in section numbering. To clarify, please refer to the
following reading material for *Unit 2* and *Unit 5* to verify the
syllabus. Do not get confused.

   - *Unit 2:* Up to *Subsection 2.2* (*Complementary Functions and Their
   Examples*). Please check *Subsection 2.2* in this reading material.
   - *Unit 5:* Only *Section 5.3* (*Evaluation of Double Integrals and Its
   Examples*), *excluding Sections 5.1 and 5.2*.  Please check *Subsection
   5.3* in this reading material

If you still have any doubts, feel free to contact me.

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

Dear *CHARUSAT Family*,

We are pleased to inform you that the *Gujarat Cultural Elocution
Competition ‚Äì 2025* is being organized by the *State NSS Department*
at *University,
Zone, and State Levels*. As part of this initiative, the *CHARUSAT NSS Unit*
will be hosting the *University Level Competition*, and we invite
enthusiastic students to participate and showcase their oratory skills.
*Competition Details:*

üìÖ *Date:* 08/03/2025   ||   *Time :* 10:00 AM Onwards
üìç *Venue:* To Be Communicated Soon
üé§ *Levels:* University ‚Üí Zone ‚Üí State

‚úÖ Character Building for Nation Building

to the *attached PDFs*.


For any queries, feel free to contact:

üìû *Mr. Dhruv Rupapara* ‚Äì Student Coordinator (*+91 63539 33976*)

*P.S.: All faculty members are requested to inform their respective
students about this competition.*

snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We are pleased to inform you that the Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025 is being organized by the State NSS Department at University, Zone, and State Levels. As part
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT Family*,

We are pleased to inform you that the *Gujarat Cultural Elocution
Competition ‚Äì 2025* is being organized by the *State NSS Department*
at *University,
Zone, and State Levels*. As part of this initiative, the *CHARUSAT NSS Unit*
will be hosting the *University Level Competition*, and we invite
enthusiastic students to participate and showcase their oratory skills.
*Competition Details:*

üìÖ *Date:* 08/03/2025   ||   *Time :* 10:00 AM Onwards
üìç *Venue:* To Be Communicated Soon
üé§ *Levels:* University ‚Üí Zone ‚Üí State
*Topics (Choose One):*

‚úÖ Character Building for Nation Building
‚úÖ Importance of Constitution in a Citizen‚Äôs Life
‚úÖ Youth: The Future of the Nation ‚Äì Challenges and Responsibilities
‚úÖ Values, Morality, and Ethics: Pillars of Indian Culture
‚úÖ Developed India 2047: Vision for a Better Future

üîπ *Eligibility:* Participants must be born on or after *01/01/1999*.
üîπ *Winners will advance to the Zone and State Level Competitions.*

Interested students are requested to fill out the registration form by
clicking the link below:

üìå  https://forms.gle/LPeLhMmYZheqgaRr9 *(Dead Line : 06/03/2025 08:00 PM)

*üèÜ Prizes & Additional Details:*

For detailed information on *competition topics and prizes*, please refer
to the *attached PDFs*.


For any queries, feel free to contact:
üìû *Mr. Kishan Patel* ‚Äì Coordinator, NSS Cell-CHARUSAT (*+91 97244 42255*)
üìû *Mr. Dhruv Rupapara* ‚Äì Student Coordinator (*+91 63539 33976*)

We look forward to your enthusiastic participation!

üí™ *Best of luck to all participants! Be prepared with high practice and
give your best performance!*

*P.S.: All faculty members are requested to inform their respective
students about this competition.*
-- 
*Mr. Kishan Patel*
*Program Coordinator*
NSS Unit- CHARUSAT
Charotar University of Science and Technology

CHARUSAT Campus, CHANGA, Gujarat- 388421
Accredited with 'A+' by NAAC - Govt. of India

*"Not Me, But You"*

subject: Insights from Continuous Evaluation Analysis Report: Problem-Based Assessment in Programming with C++ subject
snippet: Dear Students, As a subject teacher, we would like to share insights from the recent Continuous Internal Evaluation (CIE) conducted for the subject CEUC102 ‚Äì Programming with C++ in the 2nd semester.
content:
Dear Students,

As a subject teacher, we would like to share insights from the recent
*Continuous
Internal Evaluation (CIE)* conducted for the subject *CEUC102 ‚Äì Programming
with C++* in the 2nd semester. The evaluation was designed using a
*Problem-Based
Assessment (PBA) evaluation pedagogy* aligned with *Bloom‚Äôs Taxonomy*. The
attached report provides a detailed analysis of the outcomes.
*This evaluation methodology emphasized problem-solving, critical thinking,
and application of concepts, rather than rote memorization.*
*The feedback was also collected from you after conducting a CIE and you
expressed a positive perception of this evaluation pedagogy.* You recognize
the relevance of these problem-solving exercises to real-world programming
tasks and appreciate how such assessments prepare them for future
challenges. This is particularly encouraging as you are only in the 2nd
semester, and early exposure to problem-based learning will make them
mature and confident problem solvers in the coming years.

In today‚Äôs era of GenAI/LLMs, the ability to think critically, solve
complex problems, and apply concepts creatively is the key to success.
Through this pedagogical approach, we are equipping you with the skills
necessary to thrive in a rapidly evolving technological landscape.

*Attached is the evaluation analysis report for your reference. You are
requested to go through it.*

Thank you.

-- 
Regards,
Dr. Parth Goel
Assistant Professor,
Computer Science & Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research(DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
[*ACCREDITED WITH "A+" GRADE BY NAAC, GOI*],
At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist:Anand, (Gujarat) India.
Ph. No: 02697-265060, Ext. No. : 5297
https://parthgoelblog.wordpress.com/

subject: Re: Notification of Syllabus for Mid-Term Exam 2025 for CSUC101
snippet: Dear Students, Kindly note the syllabus for Mid-Term exam 2025 for course Digital Electronics -CSUC101 is as follows: Unit 1: Number Systems: Different Radix Number Systems, Number base conversions,
content:
Dear Students,

Kindly note the syllabus for *Mid-Term exam 2025* for course *Digital
Electronics -CSUC101* is as follows:

*Unit 1: Number Systems:*
Different Radix Number Systems, Number base conversions, Complements,
Signed and Unsigned Numbers, Digital arithmetic (Binary Addition and
Subtraction (normal and with complements)), Binary codes, Code Conversion,
Binary Logic and Logic Gates

*Unit 2:  Simplification of Boolean functions:  *
Boolean Algebra (Basic Definitions, Axioms, Postulates and Theorem, Boolean
functions: Canonical and Standard Form, Maxterm and Minterm, SOP and POS),
Simplification of Boolean functions using Boolean theorems and postulates,
Simplification of Boolean functions using K-map (up to 4  variable K-map),
Realize logic circuit using Basic gates and Universal gates

*Unit 3: Combinational Circuits:*
Design Procedure, Half Adder, Half Subtractor, Full Adder

All the Best for the Exam

>
--

Dr. Kirti Makwana

Mobile:+91-9586861680
[image: Inline image 1]


ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

subject: "Career_Drive with Internship - Students of 1st Year CHARUSAT"
snippet: Dear Student, We are writing to inform you of a collaborative Training and Internship Program developed in partnership with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij. This program is designed to bridge the gap between
content:
Dear Student,

We are writing to inform you of a collaborative Training and Internship
Program developed in partnership with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij. This program
is designed to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry
application, providing participants with practical skills and professional
development opportunities.

*Application Process:*

Interested students are invited to submit their application through the
following link:

https://forms.gle/vjXJ2YShgJmR7DkCA

Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further steps.

*Program Objectives:*

The program aims to equip participants with:

   - *Industry-Relevant Skills:* Through a curriculum encompassing both
   technical and non-technical domains, participants will gain practical
   knowledge applicable to current industry demands.
   - *Practical Experience:* The internship component provides hands-on
   experience through individual and collaborative projects, simulating
   real-world scenarios.
   - *Professional Development:* Mentorship from industry professionals and
   access to masterclasses will enhance participants' professional growth.

*Program Structure:*

   - *Month 1: Structured Training:*
      - Live lectures and mentorship sessions delivered by experienced
      industry practitioners.
      - Access to a Learning Management System (LMS) for six months,
      hosting course materials and resources.
      - Learning modalities:
         - Blended Learning: Pre-recorded sessions complemented by
         scheduled live Q&A sessions.
         - Live Instruction: Real-time sessions via Zoom, accompanied by
         access to recorded materials.
      - *Month 2: Applied Internship:*
      - Practical internship experience, focusing on project-based learning.
      - Project components:
         - Individual projects, allowing for focused skill development.
         - Collaborative capstone project, fostering teamwork and
         problem-solving abilities.
      - Project data and necessary materials will be provided to
      participants.

*Program Outcomes & Credentials:*

Upon successful completion, participants will receive:

   - A program completion certificate issued by *Kshitij, IIT
Kharagpur,* validating
   participation and achievement.
   - Certificates verified through *Wipro Dice ID*, enhancing credibility
   and recognition.
   - A co-branded internship certificate, acknowledging practical
   experience gained.
   - Access to a professional community.
   - Curriculum that includes training on modern tools like
   Low-Code/No-Code, and emerging technologies such as Generative AI and
   Prompt Engineering.
   - Masterclasses hosted by industry founders and CXOs.
   - Mentorship from experienced instructors.

subject: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
>
> Dear All,
>
> We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
>  at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
> students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®
>
> *Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*
>
>    1.
>
>    *On-the-Spot Counseling*
>    Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
>    study abroad questions.
>    2.
>
>    *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
>    Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
>    step-by-step.
>    3.
>
>    *Exclusive Scholarships*
>    Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations
>    like the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
>    4.
>
>    *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
>    After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile
>    for more personalized advice.
>
> This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
> clarity about your educational journey.
>
> *üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
> Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
> international education.
>
> *To register, click the link below*:
> *Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
> *Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
> *Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
> *Date: 28 FEB 2025*
>
> We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
> in students academic journey!
>
> *Thanks & Regards,**Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
> *Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
> AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
> (T) 02697-265213
>

subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 9:17 AM Subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 9:17‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon
for Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: IIEC IIT Gandhinagar <iiec@iitgn.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Feb 26, 2025 at 7:57‚ÄØPM
Subject: „Äê2 days left„ÄëRegister for Hack the Future 2025 ‚Äì Hackathon for
Solving Real-World Challenges with AI & Data
To:


Dear friends and Innovators,


Greetings from the IIT Gandhinagar Innovation and Entrepreneurship Center
(IIEC)!


We are thrilled to invite you to *Hack the Future 2025: Innovating
Intelligent Data Insights*, a national-level hackathon organized by IIEC,
IIT Gandhinagar, in collaboration with the *Ministry of Statistics and
Programme Implementation (MoSPI), Government of India*.


This *36-hour immersive challenge*, scheduled for *March 21‚Äì23, 2025*, at
IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, will bring together developers, designers,
innovators, and students to leverage *AI and data science* in addressing
critical socio-economic and development challenges using publicly available
data.



*Why Participate?*

‚úÖ *Solve Real-World Problems:* Tackle challenges curated by MoSPI,
Government of India, and contribute to meaningful solutions.
üèÜ *Win Exciting Prizes:*

   - *1st Place:* ‚Çπ2,50,000
   - *2nd Place:* ‚Çπ1,50,000
   - *3rd Place:* ‚Çπ1,00,000
   - *2 Special Mentions:* ‚Çπ35,000 each
   üöÄ *Incubation & Piloting Opportunities:* Selected projects may be
   incubated at IIEC, IIT Gandhinagar, and piloted in collaboration with MoSPI.
   üöÄ *Network & Learn:* Connect with industry experts, policymakers, and
   fellow innovators to expand your horizons.


*Key Dates*

üìÖ *Application Window:* February 7‚Äì28, 2025
üì¢ *Shortlisted Participants Announced:* March 5, 2025
üí° *Hackathon & Pitching Event:* March 21‚Äì23, 2025


If you are passionate about *AI, data science, and innovation*, this is
your opportunity to showcase your skills, collaborate with like-minded
individuals, and create a lasting impact.


*Take the First Step*

üîó *Apply Now <https://form.jotform.com/250342766778468>*
üì© *For inquiries:* iiec@iitgn.ac.in | *Visit Us
<https://chat.deepseek.com/a/chat/s/127f9456-4fc6-47ab-bf6e-760519fe586c>*


We can‚Äôt wait to see your groundbreaking ideas at *Hack the Future 2025*!



Warm regards,
*Team IIEC*

--

subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat Hackathon
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 9:44 AM Subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 27, 2025 at 9:44‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <info@gujgov.edu.in>
Date: Tue, Feb 25, 2025 at 7:44‚ÄØPM
Subject: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear,

The Education Department, Gujarat has been doing persistent efforts to
institutionalize the Innovation & Startup Ecosystem in the State through
policy, platform, and processes. To augment the support system for
nurturing student Start-ups in the State, second edition of Student
Start-up and Innovation Policy (SSIP 2.0) was launched on 05 January 2022.

Under the Policy, various flagship initiatives have been envisaged through
which youth can get adequate opportunities to harness their creative
potential. We have pioneered various Open Innovation Programmes like
hackathon and executed them at a large-scale.

The 6th Edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù with special focus on
Artificial Intelligence will be a step forward towards building smart and
sustainable solutions to complex challenges. In this edition of hackathon
around 15,000 students are expected to participate and work on problem
statements. Challenges from various departments of the State Government,
Public Sector Undertakings, Municipal Corporations, District Collectorate,
District Panchayats and industries will be broadcasted to students across
universities, institutes, and schools.

The program will feature problem statements from various sectors providing
students with ample opportunities to engage in Artificial Intelligence and
other emerging technology-based solution- oriented projects. Moreover,
winning teams will not only receive cash prizes but also invaluable
mentorship support from nodal officers of government departments and
benefits from education department of Government of Gujarat, further
encouraging their pursuit of innovation and excellence.

We request all students from your institute to actively participate in 6th
edition of ‚ÄúSmart Gujarat Hackathon‚Äù. This event presents a fantastic
opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and
innovative thinking. To get more details and further update regarding
registration process and list of sectors students can visit the following
link: https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem
statement online after registration and login in the portal.

Last date for Team registration is 10th March 2025 and synopsis Submission
is 14th March 2025.

Kindly share this with all your students and faculty members so that they
can participate in this event. For any query, please revert us at
ssipgujarat@gmail.com

Team Hackathon
Student Start-up and Innovation Policy
Education Department, Government of Gujarat
3rd Floor, Block No:2 ,Karmayogi Bhavan
Sector 10-A 382010


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

Dear All,

*The Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Department at Charotar
University of Science and Technology is pleased to invite you to
participate in our upcoming Equal Opportunity Cell (EOC) Activity on the
theme "**AI for Social Good ‚Äì Solving Real-World Issues**"*
Date: 7th March 2025
Timing: 12:00 to 2:00 pm
Registration Link: https://forms.gle/4dnzcafVqqNKr8cd9
Rules:

   -

   Students may present AI-based solutions for improving daily life,
   supporting disabled individuals, enhancing healthcare, or addressing social
   causes.
   -

   Students may submit their ideas in a group of up to 3 members.
   -

   Poster Presentation size: A2 *(presentation format is attached
   herewith.)*
   -

   The poster presentation must be in hard copy.

*Exciting Prizes:*

*1st Prize: ‚Çπ1500/-*

*2nd Prize: ‚Çπ1000/-*
*3rd Prize: ‚Çπ500/-*

   - All participants will receive an e-Certificate of Participation.

We request your kind cooperation and adherence to the above rules to ensure
the smooth conduct of the event.



-


*Thanks and Regards,*


*Gaurang A. Patel*

*Assistant Professor*

Department of Mechanical Engineering

Functional Dept: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning

Charotar University of Science & Technology

Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

*Orcid ID: *0000-0003-2356-1444 <https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2356-1444>
*https://vidwan.inflibnet.ac.in/profile/164076
<https://vidwan.inflibnet.ac.in/profile/164076>*
*https://www.webofscience.com/wos/author/record/AAY-5208-2020
<https://www.webofscience.com/wos/author/record/AAY-5208-2020>*


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications
for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content

subject: Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   *On-the-Spot Counseling*
   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.
   2.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
   Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*To register, click the link below*:
*Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
*Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
*Date: 28 FEB 2025*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
in students academic journey!

*Thanks & Regards,**Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
(T) 02697-265213

--

subject: Fwd: üåü Women Startup Meet 5.0 ‚Äì Empowering Women Entrepreneurs to Accelerate Action! üåü
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Feb 25, 2025 at 9:22 AM Subject: Fwd: üåü Women Startup Meet 5.0 ‚Äì Empowering Women
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Feb 25, 2025 at 9:22‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: üåü Women Startup Meet 5.0 ‚Äì Empowering Women Entrepreneurs to
Accelerate Action! üåü
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Parul Innovation and Entreprenuership Research Centre <
pierc@paruluniversity.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Feb 25, 2025 at 9:19‚ÄØAM
Subject: üåü Women Startup Meet 5.0 ‚Äì Empowering Women Entrepreneurs to
Accelerate Action! üåü
To:
Cc: CEO PIERC <ceo.pierc@paruluniversity.ac.in>


*Dear Mam/Sir,*

*Greetings from Parul Innovation and Entrepreneurship Research Centre,
Parul University!*

Are you a woman entrepreneur, innovator, or startup enthusiast looking for
the right platform to grow and scale your business?

We are thrilled to invite you to *Women Startup Meet 5.0*, organized by *Parul
Innovation & Entrepreneurship Research Centre (PIERC)*,*Parul
University* happening
from *March 5th to 8th, 2025*.

This premier event is designed to *empower women entrepreneurs*, helping
them *network, innovate, and pitch their startup ideas* to potential
investors, mentors, and industry leaders.

üî• *Why Should You Attend?*
This event offers a *unique opportunity* to connect with like-minded
entrepreneurs, gain valuable insights, and access funding and mentorship to
take your business to the next level.
[image: All Event 01.jpg]

*Event Highlights:*

‚úÖ *Panel Discussions* ‚Äì Engage with top industry experts & thought leaders
‚úÖ *Startup Bootcamp* ‚Äì Hands-on training sessions to refine your business
model
‚úÖ *Women Hackathon* ‚Äì Innovate, collaborate, and create impact-driven
solutions
‚úÖ *Startup Idea Pitching* ‚Äì Present your idea to investors & win grants up
to *‚Çπ2.5L*
‚úÖ *Mentor Garage* ‚Äì Get one-on-one mentoring from experienced entrepreneurs
& investors
‚úÖ *SHE Tales* ‚Äì Hear inspiring stories from successful women entrepreneurs
[image: IDEA PITCHING - 02.jpg]

üí° *Startup Idea Pitching ‚Äì Pitch Your Vision & Get Funded!*

If you have a *brilliant startup idea*, this is your chance to bring it to
life! Our *Startup Idea Pitching* session offers:

‚úÖ *Grant support up to ‚Çπ2.5L for PoC (Proof of Concept) development*
‚úÖ *Mentorship from industry experts & successful entrepreneurs*
‚úÖ *Legal support to help navigate startup regulations*
‚úÖ *Funding assistance of ‚Çπ25,000 for IPR (Intellectual Property Rights)
filing*
‚úÖ *Pre-incubation & Incubation support to help scale your startup*
‚úÖ *Networking with investors, accelerators & industry experts*

üöÄ *Who Should Attend?*

   - Women entrepreneurs and startup founders
   - Early-stage startup teams looking for funding & mentorship
   - Women professionals with innovative business ideas
   - Students & researchers with entrepreneurial aspirations
   - Investors, mentors & industry leaders supporting women-led startups

üìÖ *Event Dates:* *March 5th - 8th, 2025*
üìç *Venue:* *BBA building Ground Floor,PIERC.*

üéüÔ∏è *Limited Spots Available! Register Now to Given QR code Secure Your
Place.*

Join us in this incredible journey to *accelerate innovation, empower women
entrepreneurs, and drive impactful change*! üöÄ

Looking forward to seeing you at *Women Startup Meet 5.0!*
*Thanks & Regards*
*Parul Innovation and Entrepreneurship Research Centre*
*Parul University *
P.O. Limda, Ta. Waghodia,
Dist. Vadodara-391760
Gujarat State, India.
Website: https://www.pierc.org/

--

subject: Arthyantra Recruitment ‚Äì Apply Now for Board Member Positions
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content creation, social media
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications
for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content
creation, social media management, finance, research, and event
coordination while contributing to the club‚Äôs initiatives.

Interested students are required to fill out the Google Form
<https://forms.gle/Aw6fUvSJvebp82tp8> by March 1st. Shortlisted candidates
will be invited for in-person interviews as the next stage of selection.

üîó Form Link  <https://forms.gle/Aw6fUvSJvebp82tp8>

For any queries, please contact us.
Vansh Malani (9023046891) (Team member)
Nandini Sherwani(9265737966) (Team Member)
Mithil Mistry (8238326605)(President)
Hasti Vakani (9374615759)(President)
Rana Harmin (7046255281)(Advisor)

Best Regards,
Team Arthyantra
(Charusat Economics Club)

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Student of ‚Äé‚ÄéCHARUSAT University, This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of  ‚Äé‚Äé*CHARUSAT University*,

This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your
career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in
collaboration with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
üöÄ  *Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [23-02-2025]*
------------------------------

*üìã Application Form : *  https://forms.gle/dGvdjim8GEmwHrSD8
*‚úÖReferral ID:*‚Äé*CHARUSAT**_DICE ID  (FOR*‚Äé *CHARUSAT* *STUDENTS ONLY)*
------------------------------

*What You‚Äôll Gain:*

   1.

   *Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*
   - *Month 1*: Interactive, live sessions with industry leaders through
      your personalized learning portal.
      - *Month 2*: Real-world internship projects, providing you with the
      guidance of industry experts.
   2.

   *Industry-Recognized Certifications*
   - *Completion Certificate* from IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
      - *Internship Certificate* from top MNCs, verified by Wipro DICE ID.
   3.

   *Professional Skill Development*
   - Master cutting-edge technologies such as *Generative AI*, *Prompt
      Engineering*, and *Low/No-Code Applications*.
      - Attend exclusive guest lectures from leaders at *Microsoft* and
      *Meta*.
   4.

   *Exclusive Benefits*
   - *6-month access* to a comprehensive LMS portal with personalized
      learning options.
      - *Placement Assistance* through a dedicated growth community.
      - *24/7 personalized mentorship* and live doubt-clearing sessions to
      ensure you are on track.

This program is designed to provide you with an invaluable opportunity to
gain practical knowledge and industry credentials that will set you apart
in today‚Äôs competitive job market.
*Why You Should Apply Now:*

   - Gain unparalleled mentorship and guidance from top industry leaders.
   - Improve your employability with certifications that are globally
   recognized.
   - Access exclusive internship opportunities that can lead to exciting
   career prospects.

* Apply before the deadline to secure your place.*

For students who are already enrolled, please disregard this message.

Best regards,
*LaunchED Global*
IIT Kharagpur Kshitij

From: Premal Patel <premalpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Feb 21, 2025 at 11:52‚ÄØAM
Subject: Expert session on "Web Application Security: Identifying and
Mitigating Vulnerabilities" on 1st March 2025 (Saturday)
To: <23dce@charusat.edu.in>, <24dce@charusat.edu.in>, <22dce@charusat.edu.in>,
<21dce@charusat.edu.in>

hodds@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), FTE,
CHARUSAT has organized a talk on *"Web Application Security: Identifying
and Mitigating Vulnerabilities"*  with an objective to equip students with
skills to secure web applications from various kinds of vulnerabilities.

The expert of the talk is* Mr. Gatin Shah, Application Security Specialist,
UBS, Pune.*

You may refer to his profile on: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gatinshah/

The session will be held online, and registered participants will receive a
joining link ahead of the scheduled talk.

*Event Details:*

    Day & Date: Saturday, March 01, 2025
    Time: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

To register, please click on the following link:
https://forms.gle/zuYfbpV8rEJF8z8r8

We encourage all domain interested participants to register and get ready
to dive into this rapidly evolving domain.

Registration is open till February 26,2025

For any queries, please feel free to contact:
1. Dr. Premal Patel: +919925198251 | premalpatel.dce@charusat.ac.in
2. Dr. Khushi Patel: +917698617608 | khushipatel.ce@charusat.ac.in

-- 
*Thanks & Regards,*
*Dr. Premal J. Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*DEPSTAR (CE).*

www.charusat.ac.in

subject: Fwd: Help Your Students Secure an HR Interview at Their Dream Company!
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Feb 21, 2025 at 9:17 AM Subject: Fwd: Help Your Students Secure an HR Interview at
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Feb 21, 2025 at 9:17‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Help Your Students Secure an HR Interview at Their Dream
Company!
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Please pass this on to the students.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 20, 2025 at 6:42‚ÄØPM
Subject: Help Your Students Secure an HR Interview at Their Dream Company!
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2025/14-Feb/AICTE1/index.html>
------------------------------

Dear [Training and Placement Officer],

With *30,000+ job opportunities* from top companies like *Google, KPMG,
Amazon, EY, and Deloitte,* your students have an incredible chance to
secure an HR interview at their dream company‚Äîand we need your support to
help them seize this opportunity!


*Introducing Dream Job Challenge 2025*
Apna is giving students the platform to showcase their passion and land
interviews at their dream workplaces. They simply need to tell us why they
deserve to work there, and if they stand out, Apna will go the extra mile
to help them succeed.

*How You Can Help:*

   - *Encourage Registration* ‚Äì Ask students to sign up here:
   https://apna-job-web.app.link/e/SqXtrvexVQb
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=be98477a0c746f09e2d6f090de179e2c26939d0d&lat=2025&mid=fce76760055f554abe243f88e21858fff6026a9b>

   - *Ensure Profile Completion* ‚Äì Only completed profiles can access top
   jobs
   - *Promote Dream Job Challenge 2025* ‚Äì Inspire students to take the next
   step

PFA:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Jm0pPuX-TxNKy9WdzVYwTqYEcT6BMxe8/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=117518947182740027481&rtpof=true&sd=true
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=7662651e7872f36b4be461a9451a7bd18fe28e96&lat=2025&mid=fce76760055f554abe243f88e21858fff6026a9b>


*Best regards,*
*eGovernance*
*AICTE, New Delhi*

Dear Participants,

We‚Äôre thrilled to see such an overwhelming response to Odoo x Charusat
Hackathon '25! üéâ To keep a record of teams from all institutes of
CHARUSAT, we request you to fill out a short form. This is just for our
reference and will not affect your official registration.

forward to an exciting hackathon with you all! üöÄ

Best regards,
*Odoo x Charusat Hackathon '25 Team*

subject: Fwd: üìÖ Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   *On-the-Spot Counseling*
   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.
   2.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
   Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*To register, click the link below*:
*Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
*Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
*Date: 28 FEB 2025*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
in students academic journey!
regards
Ms. Krishna Patel (Ph.D.)
Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Science & Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research
Charotar University of Science And Technology

--

subject: Seating arrangement for Internal Exam Semester-2
snippet: Dear Students, Please find attached herewith seating arrangement for the internal exam. Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment. Students are
content:
Dear Students,

Please find attached herewith seating arrangement for the internal exam.

Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in
the examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic
devices are strictly prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left
outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card. Students have to take
their seat in the exam hall at least 15 minutes prior to the exam time. At
10:15 AM the entry gate will be closed and after 10:20 AM no one will be
allowed to enter the examination hall.

*The exam will take place in Exam Hall 201 (first floor) and 301 (second
floor) of Multi Utility Complex.*
-- 
*With regards,*

*Disha Panchal*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)*- Changa,
Accredited with "*Grade A+*" by NAAC,GOI
Accredited with *Centre of Excellence* by GOG
Email: dishapanchal.dcs@charusat.ac.in <arpitbhatt.dcs@charusat.ac.in>,
Mo. +91 9726219961

--

Subject: Expert Talk on Understanding Quantum Computing: Exploring the
Basics, Power, and Future Potential

Technology <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT <

depstar@charusat.ac.in>

hod.csds@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR), FTE,
CHARUSAT has organized a talk on *Understanding Quantum Computing:
Exploring the Basics, Power, and Future Potential *with an objective to
equip students and staff members with the skills and understanding needed
to navigate this emerging and transformative technology.

The expert of the talk is *Prof. Amlan Chakrabarti [Professor & Director:
A.K Choudhury School of IT, University of Calcutta & Adj. Professor - IIIT
Delhi*.

You may refer to his profile on :
https://www.linkedin.com/in/prof-amlan-chakrabarti-7006323a?utm_source=share&utm_campaign=share_via&utm_content=profile&utm_medium=android_app

The session will be held online, and registered participants will receive a
joining link ahead of the scheduled talk.

*Event Details:*

    Day & Date: Thursday, March 06, 2025
    Time: 12:30 PM - 2:00 PM

To register, please click on the following link:
https://forms.gle/oojcsTfJqxf3KaJ57

We encourage all interested participants (teaching staff and students) to
register and get ready to dive into this rapidly evolving domain.
Registration is open till March 01,2025

For any queries, please feel free to contact:

1. Dr. Dweepna Garg: +919601700945 | dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in
2. Mr. Kashyap Patel: +9199741 96044 | kashyappatel.dce@charusat.ac.in

Thank You

--

Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

--

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, 18 Feb, 2025, 12:56 pm Subject: Fwd: SBI College Youth Ideathon II Infyni 2025 ‚Äì
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, 18 Feb, 2025, 12:56‚ÄØpm
Subject: Fwd: SBI College Youth Ideathon II Infyni 2025 ‚Äì Exciting Awards &
Opportunities
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Ritika Gairaula <ritika.gairaula@infyni.com>
Date: Tue, Feb 18, 2025 at 12:23‚ÄØPM
Subject: SBI College Youth Ideathon II Infyni 2025 ‚Äì Exciting Awards &
Opportunities
To:
Cc: Manoj Sinha <manoj@infyni.com>, Urmmila Mandall <
urmmila.mandall@infyni.com>, Ishan Bhatia <ishan.bhatia@infyni.com>


Dear Sir/Ma'am,

We are thrilled to announce the launch of *SBI* *College Youth Ideathon
(CYI) 2025* ‚Äì India‚Äôs largest student entrepreneurship challenge, jointly
organized by *IIT Delhi*, *MEPSC* (under Min of Skill Development &
Entrepreneurship),* Infyni* and *ThinkStartup*.

Launched by* Dr Kiran Bedi *on 4th Feb 2025 at Constitution Club of India
in the August presence of Dean - IIT Delhi and CEO - MEPSC, the *SBI
College Youth Ideathon* aims to ignite innovation across all colleges,
engaging 100,000+ students in an exciting journey of ideation,
entrepreneurship, and real-world problem-solving.

We encourage your institution and students to participate in SBI College
Youth Ideathon 2025, India‚Äôs largest student entrepreneurship challenge,
and compete for different levels of awards!

üìÖ *Orientation & **How to get startup ideas** Session*: 20th Feb | ‚è∞ 5 PM
| üìç Zoom
üéôÔ∏è Speaker: *Gourav Aggarwal*, PhD Scholar, IIT Delhi

üèÜ Exciting Awards are as follows:





*üîπ Leadership Award ‚Äì Up to ‚Çπ50Küîπ Student Award ‚Äì Up to
‚Çπ50Küîπ Participant Award ‚Äì Up to ‚Çπ30Küîπ Institution Award ‚Äì ‚Çπ30K*
Join us to explore opportunities, mentorship, and recognition. Prize
details and award levels will be shared during the orientation session.

üìå Please enroll through the link for more details:
  https://infyni.com/webinar-details/how-to-get-startup-ideas
<https://infyni.com/webinar-details/how-to-get-startup-ideas>

Looking forward to your participation!

[image: image.png]

*Warm regards, *

Ritika Gairaula

*Program Manager / COLLEGE YOUTH IDEATHON**, INFYNI*

#701, 7th Floor, Sector 49, Eros City Square, Gurgaon, Haryana,122018
