subject: INFO__STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Congratulations on getting a chance for the Internship Program! As mentioned above, TechED Solutions in collaboration with Top notch MNCs is organizing an AICTE approved Training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT*  Student,* Congratulations on getting a chance for the
Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *TechED Solutions* in collaboration with *Top notch
MNCs *is organizing an *AICTE  *approved*  Training + Internship Program*.
This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt Engineering
while gaining real-world experience!
*APPLY HERE: https://forms.gle/yATh77bBnbNtZJZ6A
<https://forms.gle/yATh77bBnbNtZJZ6A>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*
 https://chat.whatsapp.com/I5Pg4Ss7KifIby6UwDpnFT

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training üéì*

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, perfect for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced performance.

*2. Internship üë©‚Äçüíª*

   - *Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and gain
   invaluable experience.
   - *Minor Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Major Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*3. Placement Assistant üë©‚Äçüíª*

   - *Mock Interviews: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.*
   -
*Personality Development: Industrial Guidance to develop your personality. *
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Group Discussion*: Group Discussion with industry experts to sharpen
   your thinking skills.

*Certification üéñÔ∏è*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious Course Completion
   Certificate
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a Internship Completion Certificate
   from our partnered* MNCs* to boost your resume.
   - *Project Certificate: * Get a Project Completion Certificate from *TechED
   Solutions*.
   - *Performance Certificate:  Get an Outstanding Performance Certificate
   from TechED Solutions.   *
   - *Recommendation Letter:  *Get a Recommendation for better placement
   and job opportunities* and PPO *from* TechED Solutions.*
   - *Approved by AICTE*: Gain credible and valuable credentials recognized
   in the industry.


*Academic Counsellor*
advaya.tech.ed@gmail.com,
+91 9572690354

subject: SPOURAL'25 Registration
snippet: Hello Everyone, As you all know SPOURAL'25 is going to start from 6th January 2025; hence, for sports and cultural registration, kindly fill out the form below. This is an opportunity to showcase
content:
Hello Everyone,

As you all know SPOURAL'25 is going to start from 6th January 2025; hence,
for sports and cultural registration, kindly fill out the form below. This
is an opportunity to showcase your talent and represent your department at
the university level.
*Let‚Äôs come together to showcase the excellence of DEPSTAR CSE.*

Interested participants are requested to fill out the form. We look forward
to maximum participation.

Sports Participation:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/16mDXYgVds7KfqmpTJ2dQ5AaLQLvB2dL96en-gN33QKI

Cultural Participation:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1BQY5kaCwbFQ82SjZGuKpx5qFkc6SM54_TetFjxUh1Zs

Cultural Coordinator:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1uvU6aU5TCsLfni0YG33B_A8GOAhQydZSpG8SkqSVilk

Detailed Schedule for Selection Slots after registration will be
communicated soon.

*The form will be closed on 08/12/2023 at 6:00 PM.*

Spoural Sports and cultural events include games for both boys and girls.

Attendance will not be given at the time of selection.

Date: Fri, Nov 29, 2024 at 11:07‚ÄØAM
Subject: ONLINE APPLICATIONS ARE INVITED FROM ANY GRADUATE ENGINEERS FROM
THE SCHEDULE TRIBE (ST) CANDIDATES OF GUJARAT STATE FOR ADMISSION IN THE
FINISHING SCHOOL PROGRAMME: Opportunity for YoP (2022, 2023 and 2024)
(Registration is open till 21-DEC-2024 time till 5:00 PM)
To:


Gentle Reminder for Registrations in the Finishing School Programme for
D-SAG.

Dear Principal/Head/Training & Placement Officers,

This is to inform you that the online registration is *OPEN for admission
to the Finishing School Programme*.

The purpose of the Finishing School Programme is to develop* employability
skills into Computer Programming Languages and IT Skillsets* as per the
industry needs.

Currently, online applications are invited from *ANY GRADUATE ENGINEERS*
from the* Schedule Tribe (ST) candidates of Gujarat State. *

Please share the below link with your alumni from *Batch YoP (2022, 2023
and 2024)* and encourage them to register. *Registration is open till*
*21-DEC-2024** till 5:00 PM.*

For Registration Visit:https://dsagsahay.gujarat.gov.in/
<https://mail.mgovcloud.in/zm/reUrlCheck.do?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdsagsahay.gujarat.gov.in%2F&>

Registration Link:
https://dsagsahay.gujarat.gov.in/CitizenPortal/instruction


Thanking You

subject: Calling All Young Leaders: Join the Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue 2025!
snippet: Dear Students, Are you ready to shape the future of India? The Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2025 is here to empower youth like you to lead the charge toward a Viksit Bharat! This
content:
Dear Students,

Are you ready to shape the future of India? The *Viksit Bharat Young
Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2025* is here to empower youth like you to lead
the charge toward a *Viksit Bharat*!

This exciting initiative, part of the *National Youth Festival (NYF) 2025*,
offers a platform to showcase your talent, share your vision, and connect
with decision-makers and global icons.
Why Should You Participate?

   - *Showcase Your Ideas:* Take part in engaging activities like quizzes,
   essays, and pitch presentations.
   - *Make an Impact:* Present your vision directly to the *Hon‚Äôble Prime
   Minister* and other eminent leaders.
   - *Gain Recognition:* Earn appreciation letters, certificates, and a
   chance to represent your state and nation.
   - *Learn and Explore:* Dive into exhibitions, cultural events, and
   interactive sessions designed to celebrate India‚Äôs heritage and progress.

How to Get Started

   1. *Step 1:* *Register for the Viksit Bharat Quiz* (November
   25th‚ÄìDecember 5th, 2024) on the *My Bharat Portal*.
   <https://mybharat.gov.in/>
   2. *Step 2:* Advance to the *Essay/Blog Competition* (December
   8th‚ÄìDecember 12th, 2024).
   3. *Step 3:* Compete in the *State and National Vision Deck
   Championships* during NYF 2025.

Themes to Explore

   - *Empowering Youth for Viksit Bharat*
   - *Making India the Global Manufacturing Powerhouse*
   - *Enhancing Productivity in Agriculture*
   - *Building Infrastructure for the Future*
   - And many more!

This is your moment to shine, inspire change, and contribute to India‚Äôs
future. We‚Äôre looking for passionate, innovative, and visionary young
minds‚Äîjust like you!

Ready to take the challenge? *Register now and be part of the movement!*

For any questions or more information, please contact me at
*jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in
<jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>* or *(M): +91 94281 53390.*

Let‚Äôs create a brighter future together.
*Best regards,*
*Mr. Jay Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*University-Level Central Students Council**,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*(M) +919428153390*
*LinkedIn: *www.linkedin.com/in/jrbpatel

*Stay healthy and fit.*
  *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*

--

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet & Seat Belt Compliance ‚Äì NSS Initiative
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Kishan Patel <coordinator.nss@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Nov 27, 2024 at 11:28 AM Subject: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet &
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Kishan Patel <coordinator.nss@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Nov 27, 2024 at 11:28‚ÄØAM
Subject: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet & Seat Belt
Compliance ‚Äì NSS Initiative
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>, <family@charusat.edu.in
>
Cc: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear  Charusat Family Members,

Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit

We would like to inform you that it is now *mandatory* for all
Students,Staff and faculty Members to:

   - *Wear helmets* while riding two-wheelers.
   - *Fasten seat belts* when driving or traveling in a car.

To ensure adherence, *NSS Volunteers* *will be stationed at both university
gates to monitor compliance and raise awareness.* We kindly ask everyone to
be *polite and cooperative* with them, as they are working to safeguard
your safety.

This initiative is *compulsory* and has been implemented to maintain a safe
environment for all members of the CHARUSAT community.

Your cooperation is crucial to the success of this initiative. Let‚Äôs work
together to make our campus safer.

Thank you for your Valuable support and understanding .


--
Regards,
Kishan Patel
NSS Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS UNIT


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear Student, Applause for the opportunity to participate in the Training and Internship Program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) is organizing a WIPRO
content:
Dear Student,* Applause for the opportunity to participate in the Training
and Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook* in collaboration with *IIT Roorkee
(Cognizance)* is organizing a *WIPRO Verified 2-Month Training + Internship
Program*. This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt
Engineering while gaining real-world experience!
*CLICK TO ONBOARD: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

  https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training *

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, flawless for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced recital.

*2. Internship *

   - *10+ Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and
   gain invaluable experience.
   - *Capstone Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Resume Building*: Obtain expert guidance to craft a standout resume
   that gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*3. Certification *

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance.
   - *Internship Certificate*: Receive a certificate from our partnered
   companies to bolster your resume.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Gain credible and valuable credentials
   recognized in the industry.




  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com

subject: Final Marks Notification (Out of 50)
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that your final marks (out of 50) have been updated. Please carefully recheck the sheets provided. Important Notes: Students highlighted in red have either not
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that your final marks (out of 50) have been updated.
Please carefully recheck the sheets provided.

*Important Notes:*

   - Students highlighted in *red* have either not submitted their
   assignments or missed the unit test or quiz.
   - If you have any concerns or find discrepancies, please inform me
   immediately.

*Kindly note:*

   - Any concerns regarding the marks *must be raised now*.
   - After this, no further queries or concerns, including those related to
   human error, will be considered.
   -   The *passing marks* for the internal exam are 18 out of 50.

Thank you for your cooperation.
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*

snippet: Dear all, Kindly Complete by today end of the day. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dipak Ramoliya <dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 1:52 PM Subject:
content:
*Dear all,*

* Kindly Complete by today end of the day.*


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dipak Ramoliya <dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 1:52‚ÄØPM
Subject: Regarding Faculty Feedback in E-governance for ODD Semester for
AY:2024-25
To: <24dcse@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Head CSE Depstar <hod.csds@charusat.ac.in>, Rima Patel <
rimapatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in>, Ankita Amaravat <
ankitaamaravat.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Kirti Makwana <
kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in>, Hardik Parmar <
hardikparmar.dcs@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Hope you are doing well and preparing well for the upcoming
examination, AY:2024-25.

Please note that you all are supposed to give *feedback of the faculties
who conducted lab/lecture sessions in the ODD Semester of AY:2024-25. *

You are supposed to give feedback from your respective login
of e-governance.

Link: *https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/*
<https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/>

Complete the task on or before *26/11/2024.*

Along with that,

The university is pleased to announce the *Margdarshak Award* initiative,
recognizing outstanding faculty members who have made a positive impact on
students' academic and personal growth.

To nominate a deserving teacher, please visit the *"Teacher Award
Nomination"* module in the *E-Governance portal*.

Please submit your nominations along with the Faculty Feedback.

Thank you for participating in this meaningful initiative and for helping
us honor exceptional educators!
-- 
*Dipak Ramoliya** /Assistant Professor,*
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,
Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)- Changa,

subject: IMPORTANT: [ODD SEM] IIT-MNC CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, we extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Certification Program. To know more about you, we request to kindly
content:
Dear* CHARUSAT* Students, we extend a warm invitation for you to
participate in the* COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE)* *Industrial Learning and
Certification Program.*



*To know more about you, we request to kindly fill up the application
form.**https://forms.gle/FWDCqeBJVA3AW63m7
<https://forms.gle/FWDCqeBJVA3AW63m7>*
*IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT : Once You filled the form kindly share the form to
your friends and make sure everyone fill the form*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/LPtg0BALSh18I1h5inKOWr
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/LPtg0BALSh18I1h5inKOWr>*



*Preferred Slots  :- JAN TO FEB*

*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:Linked in Profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/teachnook/mycompany/>*

*First month: IIT training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)*

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.


*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to 15
interns. For each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they
have to work on it.*
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Classes we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded classes: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live classes: *You will have live Zoom classes at 6:30 PM 2
to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
You will have access to the LMS(Learning Management System) portal for 6
months.

*Program Highlights:*

: India's First - offering programs with low-code and no code tools, with a
promise of 100% outcome-driven results
: linkedIn Top Startup 2023
: Certifications from Cognizance - IIT Roorkee verified through Wipro Dice
ID
: Learn from tech - giant mentors and industry leaders
: Cutting-edge curriculum including generative AI and prompt engineering
: Exclusive masterclasses with students, founders, and CXos from top global
companies
Personalized instructors for comprehensive guidance from start to finish

*Secure your spot now to pave the way for a successful career journey with
Teachnook !*



*üë®üèª‚Äçüéì Student Testimonials:*

üîí  I am thrilled to share that I have successfully completed my internship
at Teachnook and have earned my certification in Cloud Computing! This
experience has been incredibly rewarding and has significantly enhanced my
knowledge and skills in the field of cloud computing.   üñ•Ô∏è     (
https://www.linkedin.com/in/kalyani-bandaru-a0238926a/recent-activity/all/),
Kalyani Bandaru.

" Excited to announce that I'm starting my second internship as a Data
Science Intern in TEACHNOOK  <https://www.linkedin.com/company/teachnook/> in
collaboration with Cognizance and IIT Roorkee!  " üöÄ   (
https://www.linkedin.com/in/aditya-raj-kaushik-053b57259/recent-activity/all/
), Aditya Raj Kaushik.

"Excited to share that I've started my new internship role in Web
Development with Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee"

subject: Fwd: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration 2.0 Today!"
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Nov 25, 2024 at 2:32 PM Subject: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Nov 25, 2024 at 2:32‚ÄØPM
Subject: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration 2.0 Today!"
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Charusat Family,

Kindly forward the email below to your acquaintances (students, alumni,
friends, and family) who might benefit from the Government of Gujarat's
schemes to accelerate their Start-up.

We truly appreciate your continued involvement and support.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

üöÄ *Calling All Start-up Founders!*

Charusat Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*, is here
to supercharge your entrepreneurial journey!

üåü *What We Offer: *An opportunity to apply for -

üí∞ Seed support of up to *‚Çπ30 lakhs* for innovative startups as Grant and
Equity investment of *‚Çπ**1.25 Cr. *

üíº Sustenance allowance: ‚Çπ20,000/month for men-led startups & ‚Çπ25,000/month
for *women-led startups* (for 1 year).
üí° Additional support of *‚Çπ10 lakhs* for startups creating a *significant
societal impact* (total seed support up to ‚Çπ40 lakhs).
üõ†Ô∏è Training assistance: Up to *‚Çπ1 lakh per startup* for soft skills
reimbursement.
üåç Acceleration program funding: Up to *‚Çπ3 lakhs* for
national/international programs.
üìà MSME support: *1% interest subsidy* on term loans (up to 9%).


üåê *Why Choose CIVF?*
We‚Äôre an accelerator backed by a robust network of *Industrial Mentors*, *Angel
Investors*, and *VC firms*.

   - *CIVF Acceleration Program 1.0* highlights:
   ‚úÖ 32 start-ups admitted
   ‚úÖ 20+ investor calls
   ‚úÖ 120+ mentorship sessions
   ‚úÖ Recruitment drives, exhibitions, award ceremonies, and more!


‚úÖ *If you are already associated with CIVF*, kindly complete the *Seed
Support Form* üìÑ [refer to *Annexure-1*, Pages *9-12*, Points *2.3, 2.4,
and 2.5*].

üöÄ *If you are not yet associated with CIVF*, we invite you to join
our *Acceleration
Program 2.0* üåü. Upon successful completion of the program, you will become
eligible to apply for *seed funding of ‚Çπ30-40 lakhs* üí∞, as outlined
in the *Industries
Commissionerate Guidelines* üìú [refer to *Annexure-1*, Page *5*, Point *2.1*,
Sub-point *8*].

üéØ *Join the CIVF Acceleration Program 2.0! *
Be part of *Cohort 2.0*, designed to scale your startup and deliver
tangible outcomes. (Find the Brochure attached as Ann-2)

üëâ *Apply Now:* Fill out the form here
<https://civf.co.in/acceleration-program#form>.

üåê *Learn More:* Visit our website <https://civf.co.in/>.
*Also Note the Deadline is extended till 30th Nov, 2024 4:30 PM. *


Regards,


*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*


Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC

www.charusat.ac.in





-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

subject: Announcement: SPOURAL'25 - A Celebration of Sports and Cultural!
snippet: Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council! We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from *6th
content:
Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council!



We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual
sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from **6th January to
31st January 2025*.* Mark your calendars for a month of energy, enthusiasm,
and excellence!



Event Schedule:



**Sports Competitions: 6th January to 28th January,2025**



**Cultural Events: 29th January to 31st January,2025**



This year, we are excited to expand our sports categories with the
*addition of Handball and Ultimate Frisbee* for students and Chess and
Table Tennis for Faculty, bringing fresh opportunities for athletes to
shine. With these new additions, *SPOURAL'25 promises to be bigger and
better than ever!*



**Important Note:**



This is a general announcement for all Institutes/Departments. We encourage
you to start your team selection and gear up for the exciting competitions
ahead. Let‚Äôs showcase our collective talent, teamwork, and enthusiasm!



Stay tuned for further details regarding registrations, event line-ups, and
schedules. Together, let‚Äôs make SPOURAL'25 an unforgettable celebration of
sportsmanship and culture.





Warm regards,


*Convener,*


*University Level Central Students Council (ULSC).*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Reminder MSUD101 Quiz II(22/11/2024 at 11:15)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
During the quiz, if you face any problem, then consult me in room no 309,
2nd floor, Ec Ee building CSPIT.
Re-quiz will not be taken in case you remain absent.


*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: Regarding Faculty Feedback in E-governance for ODD Semester for AY:2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings for the day!!! Hope you are doing well and preparing well for the upcoming examination, AY:2024-25. Please note that you all are supposed to give feedback of the faculties who
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Hope you are doing well and preparing well for the upcoming
examination, AY:2024-25.

Please note that you all are supposed to give *feedback of the faculties
who conducted lab/lecture sessions in the ODD Semester of AY:2024-25. *

You are supposed to give feedback from your respective login
of e-governance.

Link: *https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/*
<https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/>

Complete the task on or before *26/11/2024.*

Along with that,

The university is pleased to announce the *Margdarshak Award* initiative,
recognizing outstanding faculty members who have made a positive impact on
students' academic and personal growth.

To nominate a deserving teacher, please visit the *"Teacher Award
Nomination"* module in the *E-Governance portal*.

Please submit your nominations along with the Faculty Feedback.

Thank you for participating in this meaningful initiative and for helping
us honor exceptional educators!
-- 
*Dipak Ramoliya** /Assistant Professor,*
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,
Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)- Changa,
Email: dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in,
Mo. +91 99987 71587

*Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI*

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Students of Charotar University of Science and Technology FINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND JANUARY BATCH Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a 2-month Training +
content:
Dear Students of

*Charotar University of Science and TechnologyFINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND
JANUARY BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance *IIT Roorkee*, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the* Induction Session*
 valuable.

*Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [19-11-2024]*

*  Application Form  *


*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*
*REFERRAL ID: DICE CSAT *(For CHARUSAT College Students only)



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: AICTE TRAINING & INTERNSHIP PROGRAM WITH CERTIFICATION & PLACEMENT ASSISTANCE
snippet: Dear Student, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with Cognizance, IIT Roorkee. This opportunity is for the
content:
Dear Student,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *December-January Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *1-2 month Training + Internship* designed
to provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to
all departments, though availability is limited.

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.

   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *APPLICATION FORM** & JOIN THE OFFICIAL GROUP *at your earliest
convenience.

subject: TRAINING AND INTERNSHIP @ CHARUSAT FROM IIT-ROORKEE
snippet: Dear Student, We are thrilled to inform you that you have been shortlisted for our prestigious internship program, a unique collaboration between leading MNCs at IIT Roorkee (Cognizance). Prepare for
content:
*Dear Student,*

*We are thrilled to inform you that you have been shortlisted for our
prestigious internship program, a unique collaboration between leading MNCs
at IIT Roorkee (Cognizance). *Prepare for an extraordinary journey of
learning and professional growth. Here‚Äôs what you can expect:

*Program Highlights:*

   - *Duration: 2 months online Training and Internship*
   - *Features: Comprehensive training sessions and hands-on internship
   experience*





*Application Process:To begin your journey, Please fill out the application
form and secure your Internship Slothttps://forms.gle/bPJXZhPHiifnYxoc9
<https://forms.gle/bPJXZhPHiifnYxoc9>**Program Structure:*
*First Month:*

   - *Intensive training with IIT Roorkee and industrial experts.*
   - *Live lectures and mentorship from industry leaders.*
   - *Interactive sessions through the LMS Portal.*

*Second Month:*

   - *Immersive internship experience with live mentorship.*
   - *Work on 11 real-world projects to gain practical knowledge.*

*Projects:*

   - *10 Minor Projects: Individual assignments on various covered topics.*
   - *1 Major Project (Capstone): Team collaboration with specific roles,
   supported by data and materials from companies.*

*Why Should You Apply??*

‚úî








*Comprehensive Learning: From Basic to Advanced Concepts.‚úîGuaranteed
internship: secure your future.‚úîGlobally Verified Certificates: Earn 3+
accredited certificates verified by "Wipro.".‚úîPlacement Assistance: Get
help landing a job.‚úîReal-World Projects: At least 3 industry-based
projects.‚úîLetters of recommendation: From project heads.‚úîMock Interviews &
GDs: Prepare for placements.‚úîLive & Recorded Sessions: Learn at your own
pace.‚úî24/7 Support: We're here whenever you need us.‚úîDoubt Resolution: Via
live sessions.*

*"Achieve your dream job even during economic downturns.üéì"*

*Stay Connected:*
*For updates and further information, join our official WhatsApp group:*
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/JE3s8iGFfllEYmmbo4pPcc*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/JE3s8iGFfllEYmmbo4pPcc>

*This program perfectly combines theoretical knowledge, practical
experience, and industry exposure. Equip yourself with the essential skills
and insights to excel in your chosen field. We‚Äôre excited to welcome you
and look forward to an amazing journey together!*

subject: INFO_STUDENTS of 1st Year to Attend the AICTE Approved Training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for the opportunity to participate in the Training and Internship Program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) is organizing a
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student,* Applause for the opportunity to participate in
the Training and Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook* in collaboration with *IIT Roorkee
(Cognizance)* is organizing a *WIPRO Verified 2-Month Training + Internship
Program*. This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt
Engineering while gaining real-world experience!
*CLICK TO ONBOARD: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

  https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training üéì*

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, flawless for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced recital.

*2. Internship üë©‚Äçüíª*

   - *10+ Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and
   gain invaluable experience.
   - *Capstone Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Resume Building*: Obtain expert guidance to craft a standout resume
   that gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certification üéñÔ∏è*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance.
   - *Internship Certificate*: Receive a certificate from our partnered
   companies to bolster your resume.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Gain credible and valuable credentials
   recognized in the industry.




  Bipin Shah
Key Account Manager,Teachnook
9364102817
| teachnook.com
| bipin@teachnook.com

subject: Syllabus of MSUD101 for MIDTERM Exam
snippet: Dear Students Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024 for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in the Midterm exam conducted in the
content:
Dear Students
Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024
for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in
the Midterm exam conducted in the month of September. The paper style and
Syllabus of the exam is as follows:
Paper Style
05 MCQ +15 Marks Discreptive questions
Syllabus:
Unit 1 : Higher order derivative
Unit 2 : Infinite series *( Infinite series * *only* *and Complex number is
not included in the exam)*
Unit 3 : Matrix
Unit 4: Partial differentiation
BEST OF LUCK ....

If you have any queries, then consult me in the staff room 309, 2nd floor,
Ec Ee building.

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

--

subject: Fwd: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Rajesh Savalia <rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Nov 7, 2024 at 11:11 AM Subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Rajesh Savalia <rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Nov 7, 2024 at 11:11‚ÄØAM
Subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
To: <24dcse@charusat.edu.in>, <24dce@charusat.edu.in>, <
24dit@charusat.edu.in>, <24dcs@charusat.edu.in>


Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. Earlier it was scheduled for 18/11/202. It has been
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*





-- 
*Dipak Ramoliya** /Assistant Professor,*
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,
Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)- Changa,
Email: dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in,
Mo. +91 99987 71587

*Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI*

--

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY ANAND, GUJRAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-
content:
*DEAR STUDENTSOFCHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYANAND, GUJRAT*

*Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>


* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

subject: INFO_STUDENTS of 1st Year to Attend the AICTE Approved Training and Internship Program
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Congratulations for getting a chance for the Training and Internship Program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with IIT Roorkee (Cognizance) is organizing a WIPRO
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student,* Congratulations for getting a chance for the
Training and Internship Program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook* in collaboration with *IIT Roorkee
(Cognizance)* is organizing a *WIPRO Verified 2-Month Training + Internship
Program*. This is your chance to master Low Code, No Code, and Prompt
Engineering while gaining real-world experience!
*APPLY HERE: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

  https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>

*Explore the details below to see what awaits you:*
*1. Training üéì*

   - *Professional Mentors*: Learn from industry experts who will guide you
   through every step.
   - *From Scratch*: Master fundamentals and advanced skills, perfect for
   any skill level.
   - *Low Code/No Code*: Build powerful applications with minimal coding
   knowledge.
   - *Generative AI*: Develop and fine-tune AI models for cutting-edge
   applications.
   - *Prompt Engineering*: Learn to design and optimize AI prompts for
   enhanced performance.

*2. Internship üë©‚Äçüíª*

   - *10+ Live Projects*: Apply your knowledge in real-world projects and
   gain invaluable experience.
   - *Capstone Project*: Collaborate with partnered companies on impactful
   projects.
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certification üéñÔ∏è*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance.
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a certificate from our partnered
   companies to bolster your resume.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Gain credible and valuable credentials
   recognized in the industry.


*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

subject: IMPORTANT, ODD SEM]IIT-MNC CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear Student We extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Internship opportunities. To know more about you, we request to kindly fill up
content:
Dear Student

We extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the *COGNIZANCE (IIT
ROORKEE)* *Industrial Learning and Internship opportunities*.



*To know more about you, we request to kindly fill up the application form.*
*https://forms.gle/xu44E5NhjdV3TSmq6 <https://forms.gle/xu44E5NhjdV3TSmq6>*
*Application Form:*

*(FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS)*

*JOIN OUR OFFICIAL WHATSAPP GROUP*
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/IKG0FQjjnSm5Azy2Yaoa9j*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/IKG0FQjjnSm5Azy2Yaoa9j>

*Here's a brief overview of what the program entails:*
Duration:*2-3 Months*
Mode: *REMOTE*


‚öôÔ∏è *First month(Industrial Training program):-* Comprehensive training
program led by industry professionals with 10+ years of experience,
Hands-on projects with 10+ live projects, covering 25-30 modules and over
80 hours of content.

‚öôÔ∏è *Second month(Industrial Projects):-*  Practical experience with the
capstone project, accompanied by mentorship from an experienced
professional from the partnering MNC.

*Project 1:- 1 Individual projects* are assigned to each intern, which they
must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:- Capstone Project:* A group project assigned to 15 interns. For
each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they have to work
on it.


*(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)*And also You'll be having a Mentor from the same
MNC, he'll be guiding you in each and every moment of your Internship
period.

*After Completion of the program, the student will receive the:*





*‚úÖ Program Completion Certificate issued by  COGNIZANCE IIT
ROORKEE‚úÖ Co-Branded Internship Certificate from MNC's and
Startup's.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation from MNCs.‚úÖ Access to a Growing
Community.  ‚úÖ Microsoft Certification Examination Training.*




*Best Regards,TeachnookCOGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE)*

subject: CHARUSAT - FMS - IIIM - Invitation @ Prabandhan 2024 (Exhibition cum Sale) - Inaugural Ceremony
snippet: Dear All, Greetings! We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) is organising PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 from October 25 to 28, 2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM). Prabandhan
content:
Dear All,



Greetings!



We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of
Management (IIIM) is organising *PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 *from October 25 to 28,
2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM).


Prabandhan is a student-driven event in which students work in close
collaboration with industries, entrepreneurs, gruh-udhyog, and SMEs to
understand the product, devise marketing strategies, learn financial
management and negotiation skills, and ultimately sell the product.


You are invited to visit the exhibition with your family, friends, and
relatives to motivate the student participants.




The inaugural ceremony details are as follows:



*Chief Guest: Anitaben Patel & Aartiben Patel (IPCO Parivar)*

*Place: Sardar Patel Banquet Hall, Anand (Opp. D Z Patel High School, 80
Feet Road, Anand)*

*Date: October 25, 2024 (Friday)*

*Timing: 10:00 AM*



*Please find the attached invitation and product poster herewith this mail.*


*Hoping to see you all at Prabandhan 2024 during all the four days of the
event (October 25-28, 2024).*



*Regards,*



*TEAM PRABANDHAN - IIIM*

--

subject: Congratulations 24dcs053! AICTE-Approved IIT Roorkee Cognizance Internship for Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research, Bachelor‚Äôs in Computer Science Engineering Department Students
snippet: Dear 24dcs053, Congratulations! You've been shortlisted for the OCTOBER, NOVEMBER & DECEMBER batches of our highly sought-after Training & Internship Program! We're excited to invite
content:
Dear 24dcs053,


*Congratulations!* You‚Äôve been *shortlisted* for the *OCTOBER, NOVEMBER &
DECEMBER batches* of our highly sought-after *Training & Internship Program*
!

We‚Äôre excited to invite you to join this incredible opportunity to gain
hands-on experience and industry-recognized certifications. To confirm your
spot, please *fill out the registration form ASAP* (seats are filling up
fast!).


*Registration Form**:*

  *Register Here* <https://forms.gle/HdPRDfx4rMxz5nf9A>

Key Details:

   - *Program Duration*: 1 or 2 months (your choice)
   - *Mode*: 100% Remote
   - *Batches*: October, November, December

Why This Program?

   - *Month 1 (Training)*:
      - Led by *industry professionals* with 10+ years of experience.
      - *10+ live projects*.
      - *25-30 modules* with over *80 hours* of practical learning.
   - *Month 2 (Internship)*:
      - Work on a *capstone project*.
      - Receive *mentorship* from experts at top MNCs.

Exclusive Benefits Upon Completion:

   - *Certificate of Completion* from COGNIZANCE.
   - *Internship Certificate* co-branded by MNCs and Startups.
   - *Letter of Recommendation* from partnering MNCs.
   - *Microsoft Certification Exam Training*.
   - *100% Placement Assistance*.
   - Join a *growing professional community* of peers and mentors.

Don‚Äôt miss this chance to kickstart your career! Spots are limited, and
they‚Äôre filling up fast, so *act now*!

*Join our WhatsApp Group for more details and updates*:
*Click here to join* <https://chat.whatsapp.com/KLKHWPqVddC4aDRok4RbsB>

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me directly.

Best regards,

*Digant Kumar*

*(Senior Executive)*

Phone: +91 63625 34906

digant.kumar@teachnook.com

*****     This mail is from external domain, i.e. not from
gujarat.gov.in domain. Kindly open attachment and link with caution.
  *****

Dear Secretaries/Directors (Higher & Technical Education)

(All States/UTs in the country)

Greetings from AICTE!

As you know, Yuva Sangam is a key initiative under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha
Bharat (EBSB) program, launched by the Hon'ble Prime Minister of India.
This flagship program facilitates exposure tours for youth primarily
students from Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) to experience diverse
cultures and achievements across different states. Through these exchanges,
we aim to foster national integration and understanding among young people.

Yuva Sangam not only emphasizes cultural exchange but also includes
activities designed to enhance leadership, sports, and soft skills.
Participants will engage in workshops on communication and teamwork, take
part in sports events organized by SAI, and have the chance to interact
with VVIPs and notable personalities from the host state.

The success of previous Yuva Sangam phases underscores the vital role of
youth in building connections across communities. This initiative has
positively impacted the lives of thousands, contributing to a more united
and inclusive India.

I request you to kindly direct *all institutions* imparting higher and
technical education (UG, PG, doctoral etc.) under your State/UT to advise
and motivate their students to register for Yuva Sangam Phase-5, an
enriching student exchange program under EBSB.

Registration is open from *October 10, 2024* to *October 21, 2024* and can
be completed online at https://ebsb.aicte-india.org/.

Please find attached a document with strategies to inspire student
registrations for Yuva Sangam.

Thank you for your support.

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq








*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*


*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

subject: CHARUSAT Team Selection for All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a prestigious platform where you
can showcase your talents and represent our university on a national level.

*Benefits of Participation:*

- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.

- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.

- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.

- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

*Important Details:*

*- Registration Form: *https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

*- Deadline for Registration:* 1st November, 2024

*- Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations*: Please review the attached
documents carefully for event details and required documents.

We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

--

subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. RV Upadhyay <rvu.as@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Oct 17, 2024 at 1:57 PM Subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025 To: Teaching Staff
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. R V Upadhyay <rvu.as@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Oct 17, 2024 at 1:57‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
To: Teaching Staff <teachingstaff@charusat.ac.in>



Professor R V Upadhyay
Provost,
Charotar University of Science & Technology, CHARUSAT Campus,
Changa-388 421, Dist. Anand, Gujarat, India.
e-mail: provost@charusat.ac.in <dean.research@charusat.ac.in>,
rvu.as@charusat.ac.in
Phone: +91-2697-265015,   M.  09427215242
ORCID id: 0000-0001-7309-3269
https://charusat.irins.org/profile/156375


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: HT Patel <htpatel@yuvalay.org>
Date: Thu, Oct 17, 2024 at 10:47‚ÄØAM
Subject: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
To: Trushit Upadhyaya <trushitupadhyaya.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Manan Raval <
mananraval.ph@charusat.ac.in>, Principal ARIP CHARUSAT <
principal.arip@charusat.ac.in>, Principal PDPIAS CHARUSAT <
principal.pdpias@charusat.ac.in>, Ashwin Makwana <
ashwinmakwana.ce@charusat.ac.in>, <swatijoshi@civf.co.in>
Cc: Dr. R V Upadhyay <rvu.as@charusat.ac.in>, Registrar CHARUSAT <
registrar@charusat.ac.in>, Ashok Patel <arpatel.adm@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sirs,

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce the 7th edition of *Maker Fest Vadodara!* The
event is scheduled for *February 1st and 2nd (Sat-Sun), 2025.*

Innovation is the key to shaping the future, and *Maker Fest Vadodara* is
the ultimate platform for students to showcase their groundbreaking ideas.
Whether they‚Äôre solving real-world problems or creating something entirely
new, this is their chance to be at the forefront of change.

In the past six editions, we‚Äôve seen incredible participation - over 1500
registrations, 360 Maker Teams exhibited, prize amount of Rs10.75 lakhs
distributed and welcomed over 47,000 visitors.

*We invite your students to be a part of this movement* ‚Äì as *Makers*. If
they‚Äôre working on something original and useful, this is their moment to
shine, network with industry leaders, and gain valuable exposure.

*Event Details:*

   - *Dates:* February 1st & 2nd, 2025 (Saturday-Sunday)
   - *Venue:* Grounds of Faculty of Technology, MSU

Registrations will open soon at: www.makerfestvadodara.com.

Encourage your students to gear up and submit their best projects.

Let‚Äôs make this year‚Äôs Maker Fest Vadodara the best one yet!
Regards,
H T Patel
Managing Trustee
Yuvalay Charitable Trust
Ph no: 9974051555
www.yuvalay.org


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 10:14 AM Subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students To: <
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 10:14‚ÄØAM
Subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
To: <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, Bhavika Patel <
bhavikapatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Dipak Ramoliya <
dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Ritika Jani <ritikajani.dit@charusat.ac.in
>
Cc: Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>,
Head Physics <head.physics@charusat.ac.in>, Head Maths <
head.maths@charusat.ac.in>, Pratik Pataniya <
pratikpataniya.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Sachin Patel <
sachinpatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Rajesh V. Savalia <
rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

*About Foundation Course: *
Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a *mandatory audit course*
for all *1st semester BTech students*. This course is designed to bridge
the gap between high school and university-level concepts, focusing on
fundamental topics such as calculus, algebra, mechanics, electromagnetism,
etc. The aim is to build a strong foundation for your advanced engineering
studies.


*Course Evaluation:*>> Internal Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(Date: 19/10/2024 |
3:00 PM to 3:30 PM) (Link will be provided before 05 mins of the quiz time)*
>> External Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(to be announced later with the external
theory exam)*
>> Total: *50 Marks*
>> Both quizzes will be conducted *online (Google Forms)*.
>> Questions in both quizzes will be asked from the question banks attached
with this email.


*Important Note:*
*1) No excuse for internet connectivity, device failure, etc will be
entertained. If you failed to attend the quiz then you shall be marked
absent.*
*2) This is a separate course that has to do nothing with your
ongoing Engineering Physics and Engineering Mathematics courses.*

*Attachments*
1) Syllabus of Foundation Course
2) Question Bank of Physics and Mathematics

For any queries, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Sanni
-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D

subject: Re: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs Management | Technical Club
snippet: Dear all, In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management | Technical Club is excited to introduce the "Introduction to Dart Programming" initiative. We believe that
content:
Dear all,



In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management |
Technical Club is excited to introduce the  *"Introduction
to Dart Programming" *initiative. We believe that education extends beyond
the classroom and that collaborative learning can thrive even after formal
college hours.

In this context, we are organizing a webinar on  *"Introduction
to Dart Programming". * This session will be delivered by *Mr. Pravin Jadav*
.

*Webinar Details:*

   - *Date:* 22nd October,2024
   - *Time:* 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM
   - *Mode:* Online (MS Teams - The joining link will be sent to registered
   participants only.)

*Registration Process:*

To attend this insightful session, please click the link below to register:

¬∑       Registration link:
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScfLdm71d0Y3Vm7IpyNf9MzDYo5AS83Um8jiuMBj3yKwIpUJw/viewform?usp=sf_link
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScfLdm71d0Y3Vm7IpyNf9MzDYo5AS83Um8jiuMBj3yKwIpUJw/viewform?usp=sf_link>*

¬∑       Registration Deadline: 20th , October 2024

It‚Äôs a fantastic opportunity to expand your technical knowledge and explore
the future of digital trust.

For any queries, please feel free to contact Mr. Arpit Bhatt (Email id:
arpitbhatt.dcs@charusat.ac.in | Contact: 8200247217).

We look forward to your active participation!


[image: WhatsApp Image 2024-10-16 at 9.36.16 AM.jpeg]

>
> I will be conducting a session on *"Introduction to Dart Programming"* on *22nd
> October* from *7:00 PM to 8:00 PM*.
>
> On Fri, Oct 11, 2024 at 2:47‚ÄØPM Dr Dweepna Garg <
> dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>
>> Dear club coordinators,
>>
>> Let me know of any further plans. efforts from your end to make the
>> initiative successful? Who are the other staff members who have shown

>> motivate them?
>>
>> Hereby I also nominate Mr. Pravin to give his available date along with
>> the latest topic and time to the club's team and schedule the session.
>>
>> Session is scheduled from 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM [in-between only]. duration
>> can be decided by the speaker
>>
>> ---------- Forwarded message ---------
>> From: Dipika Damodar <dipikadamodar.dit@charusat.ac.in>
>> Date: Fri, Sep 20, 2024 at 2:09‚ÄØPM
>> Subject: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs Management |
>> Technical Club
>> To: DEPSTAR <depstar@charusat.ac.in>
>> Cc: Dr Dweepna Garg <dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <
>> hodds@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
>> principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
>>
>>
>> Dear all,
>>
>>
>>
>> In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management
>> | Technical Club is excited to introduce the "*Learn After College Hours*"
>> initiative. We believe that education extends beyond the classroom and that
>> collaborative learning can thrive even after formal college hours.
>>
>> In this context, we are organizing a webinar on *"Blockchain
>> Foundations: The Core of Trustless Technology"*. This session will be
>> delivered by *Ms. Naina Parmar*
>>
>>
>>
>> *Webinar Details:*
>>
>>    - *Date:* 25th September,2024
>>    - *Time:* 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
>>    - *Mode:* Online (MS Teams - The joining link will be sent to
>>    registered participants only.)
>>
>> *Why Attend?*
>>
>> Blockchain technology is reshaping industries by enabling secure,
>> decentralized, and transparent systems. Through this session, you will:
>>
>>    - Understand the core principles of blockchain and its architecture.
>>    - Explore the concept of a *trustless system* and how blockchain
>>    ensures security without intermediaries.
>>    - Learn about the real-world applications of blockchain in various
>>    sectors like finance, healthcare, and supply chain.
>>    - Get insights into future career opportunities in the blockchain
>>    domain.
>>
>>  *Registration Process:*
>>
>> To attend this insightful session, please click the link below to
>> register:
>>
>> ¬∑       Registration link: https://forms.gle/LfTufATSkW11wUGK6
>>
>> ¬∑       Registration Deadline: 23rd , September 2024
>>
>> It‚Äôs a fantastic opportunity to expand your technical knowledge and
>> explore the future of digital trust.
>>
>> For any queries, please feel free to contact Ms. Dipika Damodar (Email
>> id: dipikadamodar.dit@charusat.ac.in | Contact: 7405862155).
>>
>> We look forward to your active participation!
>>
>>
>> --
>> Best Regards,
>> Clubs Management | Technical Club
>>
>>
>>
>>
>> --
>> Regards:
>> Dr Dweepna Garg
>> Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
>> Department of Computer Engineering
>> Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
>> Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
>> Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)
>>
>>

--

*Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)*- Changa,

subject: Internship Program with Meta Course
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings from MetaCourse! We are excited to announce the final opportunity to enroll in our exclusive Training and Internship Program, designed to give you hands-on industrial knowledge
content:
*Dear Students,*

*Greetings from MetaCourse!*

We are excited to announce the final opportunity to enroll in our exclusive
Training and Internship Program, designed to give you hands-on industrial
knowledge and practical skills.

*About MetaCourse:*

MetaCourse is one of the leading platforms dedicated to equipping students
with real-world skills through top-notch training and internships. We focus
on bridging the gap between academia and the industry, ensuring you are
job-ready with the latest trends and tools.

*Program Overview:*

‚úÖ *Training Program: *
Gain in-depth industrial knowledge with expert guidance. Complete the
program to unlock the opportunity for an internship.

*‚úÖ Internship Period:*
Upon completing the training, students will be doing an internship with
MetaCourse, where they can further enhance their skills and gain practical
experience.

*‚úÖ Stipend Range: *
Internship stipends range from *‚Çπ25,000 to ‚Çπ40,000, *depending on your
performance during the training & Internship phase.


*How to Apply:*

1. *Step 1: *Fill out the Google Form to apply for the internship program:

*Google form:* https://forms.gle/QBrerbMaApDCRdsH7

2. *Step 2:* Join the WhatsApp group for updates and further

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E467FtYD67eGzL3auQWutp

*Post-Completion Benefits:*

*- üìú Program Completion Certificate  *
*- üèÖ Co-Branded Internship Certificate*
*- üìù Letter of Recommendation*
*- üåê Access to MetaCourse‚Äôs Exclusive Growth Community*


*Why MetaCourse?*

- Learn from experienced professionals in your field.
- Enhance your employability with real-time project experience.
- Join a network of like-minded individuals and industry experts.

If you are ready to take your skills to the next level, act now before it's
too late!



*Thanks & Regards,*
*The MetaCourse Team*

subject: Announcement of ULSC Logo Competition Winner
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty, We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition! After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we are pleased to congratulate
content:
Dear Students and Faculty,

We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition!

After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we
are pleased to congratulate *Satyam Charola (ID: 22CE016)* as the winner of
this competition. His design will represent the ULSC, and we appreciate the
effort and creativity he put into the logo.

Satyam was awarded with a cash prize for his achievement.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all participants for their outstanding
contributions and enthusiasm. Stay tuned for more such opportunities!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

Dear Students,

This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1
will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

*Quiz Details:*
Quiz 1
Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,
Sanni

subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva Sangam Phase-5.
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Oct 15, 2024 at 9:04 AM Subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Oct 15, 2024 at 9:04‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva
Sangam Phase-5.
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply1@aicte-india.org>
Date: Mon, Oct 14, 2024 at 5:42‚ÄØPM
Subject: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva Sangam
Phase-5.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


*Gentle Reminder!*

Dear Vice Chancellor/Director/Principal/ Dean,
Greetings from AICTE!

As you know, Yuva Sangam is a key initiative under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha
Bharat (EBSB) program, launched by the Hon'ble Prime Minister of India.
This flagship program facilitates exposure tours for youth primarily
students from Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) to experience diverse
cultures and achievements across different states. Through these exchanges,
we aim to foster national integration and understanding among young people.

Yuva Sangam not only emphasizes cultural exchange but also includes
activities designed to enhance leadership, sports, and soft skills.
Participants will engage in workshops on communication and teamwork, take
part in sports events organized by SAI, and have the chance to interact
with VVIPs and notable personalities from the host state.

The success of previous Yuva Sangam phases underscores the vital role of
youth in building connections across communities. This initiative has
positively impacted the lives of thousands, contributing to a more united
and inclusive India.

I encourage you to motivate your students to register for Yuva Sangam
Phase-5, an enriching student exchange program under EBSB.

Registration is open from *October 10, 2024* to *October 21, 2024* and can
be completed online at https://ebsb.aicte-india.org/.

Please find attached a document with strategies to inspire student
registrations for Yuva Sangam.

Thank you for your support.

PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/185HEA2xFC-E7F_m5B2ltwDzMUkeHmx52/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/17xAJKN_yZcXZ4Q2ZyN-XDgba3JeuA1JL/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uTQIiAiaeBZ19EvRBtyKXhNsSAqkynme/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=117518947182740027481&rtpof=true&sd=true


*Best regards,*
*Naresh Grover*

*Director (Nodal Officer, Yuva Sangam)AICTE*


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 11 Oct 2024 at 4:28‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva
Sangam Phase-5.
To: HOD Depstar <hodds@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org>
Date: Fri, Oct 11, 2024 at 4:25‚ÄØPM
Subject: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva Sangam
Phase-5.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Vice Chancellor/Director/Principal/ Dean,

Greetings from AICTE!

As you know, Yuva Sangam is a key initiative under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha
Bharat (EBSB) program, launched by the Hon'ble Prime Minister of India.
This flagship program facilitates exposure tours for youth primarily
students from Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) to experience diverse
cultures and achievements across different states. Through these exchanges,
we aim to foster national integration and understanding among young people.

Yuva Sangam not only emphasizes cultural exchange but also includes
activities designed to enhance leadership, sports, and soft skills.
Participants will engage in workshops on communication and teamwork, take
part in sports events organized by SAI, and have the chance to interact
with VVIPs and notable personalities from the host state.

The success of previous Yuva Sangam phases underscores the vital role of
youth in building connections across communities. This initiative has
positively impacted the lives of thousands, contributing to a more united
and inclusive India.

I encourage you to motivate your students to register for Yuva Sangam
Phase-5, an enriching student exchange program under EBSB.

Registration is open from *October 10, 2024* to *October 21, 2024* and can
be completed online at https://ebsb.aicte-india.org/.

Please find attached a document with strategies to inspire student
registrations for Yuva Sangam.

PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/12ld4OV6e8Gq6h6btI1jAiW37Kmk-6o59/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/18giR_8NUOq7GqTpgx6Y1CpnWFb6Zt_ow/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yJfLJ4XcDTJnGyIEQCw4ZHsSSaAB-PFu/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=117518947182740027481&rtpof=true&sd=true


*Thank you for your support.*
*Best regards,*
*Naresh Grover*
*Director (Nodal Officer, Yuva Sangam)*
*AICTE*
